title: WhatsApp Messenger
description:
WhatsApp from Meta is a FREE messaging and video calling app. It‚Äôs used by over 2B people in more than 180 countries. It‚Äôs simple, reliable, and private, so you can easily keep in touch with your friends and family. WhatsApp works across mobile and desktop even on slow connections, with no subscription fees*.
    
 
  Private messaging across the world
 
  Your personal messages and calls to friends and family are end-to-end encrypted. No one outside of your chats, not even WhatsApp, can read or listen to them.
 
 
  Simple and secure connections, right away 
 All you need is your phone number, no user names or logins. You can quickly view your contacts who are on WhatsApp and start messaging. 
 
 High quality voice and video calls 
 Make secure video and voice calls with up to 32 people for free*. Your calls work across mobile devices using your phone‚Äôs Internet service, even on slow connections. 
 
 Group chats to keep you in contact 
 Stay in touch with your friends and family. End-to-end encrypted group chats let you share messages, photos, videos and documents across mobile and desktop. 
 
 Stay connected in real time 
 Share your location with only those in your individual or group chat, and stop sharing at any time. Or record a voice message to connect quickly.
 
 
 Share daily moments through Status 
 Status allows you to share text, photos, video and GIF updates that disappear after 24 hours. You can choose to share status posts with all your contacts or just selected ones. 
 
 Use WhatsApp on your Wear OS watch to continue conversations, reply to messages, and take calls - all from your wrist. And, leverage tiles and complications to easily access your chats and send voice messages.   
 
 *Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details.     
______________________________________________________________
 
 
 If you have any feedback or questions, please go to WhatsApp > Settings > Help > Contact Us.
  
 Terms of Service: https://www.whatsapp.com/legal/terms-of-service  
 Learn more about messaging privately: https://www.whatsapp.com/privacy  
 Learn more about WhatsApp safety: https://www.whatsapp.com/security
descriptionHTML:
WhatsApp from Meta is a FREE messaging and video calling app. It‚Äôs used by over 2B people in more than 180 countries. It‚Äôs simple, reliable, and private, so you can easily keep in touch with your friends and family. WhatsApp works across mobile and desktop even on slow connections, with no subscription fees*.


Private messaging across the world

Your personal messages and calls to friends and family are end-to-end encrypted. No one outside of your chats, not even WhatsApp, can read or listen to them.


Simple and secure connections, right away
All you need is your phone number, no user names or logins. You can quickly view your contacts who are on WhatsApp and start messaging.

High quality voice and video calls
Make secure video and voice calls with up to 32 people for free*. Your calls work across mobile devices using your phone‚Äôs Internet service, even on slow connections.

Group chats to keep you in contact
Stay in touch with your friends and family. End-to-end encrypted group chats let you share messages, photos, videos and documents across mobile and desktop.

Stay connected in real time
Share your location with only those in your individual or group chat, and stop sharing at any time. Or record a voice message to connect quickly.


Share daily moments through Status
Status allows you to share text, photos, video and GIF updates that disappear after 24 hours. You can choose to share status posts with all your contacts or just selected ones.

Use WhatsApp on your Wear OS watch to continue conversations, reply to messages, and take calls - all from your wrist. And, leverage tiles and complications to easily access your chats and send voice messages.

*Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details.
______________________________________________________________


If you have any feedback or questions, please go to WhatsApp > Settings > Help > Contact Us.

Terms of Service: https://www.whatsapp.com/legal/terms-of-service
Learn more about messaging privately: https://www.whatsapp.com/privacy
Learn more about WhatsApp safety: https://www.whatsapp.com/security
summary: Simple. Reliable. Private.

scraped_reviews.content: Easy to use and just an amazing app to stay connected and share pictures and videos with everyone! EDIT: down to 1 star after update. Choosing photos to upload is horrible now! It doesn't show all my photos. The drop down menu to select the album sucks too. If I choose to see more, it only shows me 5 "collections" It used to be much easier before. I don't know why or how or who approved this but it sucks BAD.

Hate this app. I'm already in, and have been in several group chats, now all of a sudden it needs me to sync my contacts before I can proceed. I don't want to sync unwanted contacts to my app just to continue communicating with the people I've been communicating with for over a year now. I think these "app permissions" are more restricting than anything, almost as if to say, "Give us access to your entire phone's contents if you want to use our app" and I'm getting tired of it.

My biggest complaint with this app is that while you're reading previous messages to catch up in a conversation, if another person starts typing while you're reading, the entire conversation thread jumps around depending on whether the person is typing or not. This is especially annoying in a group chat. There should just be a space at the bottom of the chat where the typing symbol can appear without being problematic.

It was great until they forced stored contacts access. They're now forcing you to "share" your contacts with them to send pictures, etc to friends when it wasn't necessary before today, 11/9/25. no app needs your contacts to send anything...it should only need the phone number. I'm suspecting they're positioning themselves to sell people's data. So yeah, it was a great app that didn't need much but those days are over. Another bastion of privacy and security has fallen.

I've used Whatsapp for almost ten years and loved it until Facebook bought it out. I trust Whatsapp. I don't trust Facebook. ever since Facebook took over the app has wanted more and more access to my data, contacts, and permissions. This is no longer my primary app for messaging, and fallen from first to third as better, less intrusive messaging apps have taken its place. Remember to find balance when it comes to your personal data, and never go too far to sacrifice convenience for security.

Super annoying that when I want to attach a file, the app doesn't even give me access to all the folders on my device containing media files. It only shows a small subset of my media folders. If I want to send a file located in a different folder I have to locate it in my media gallery, then share to Whatsapp as opposed to just being able to attach it directly from a WhatsApp chat. Really basic feature that they can't even do properly.

I like the app, but something about searching for music when adding to my status is kind of bothering me. I was wondering if you can make it able for us to search for music with the artist and song name at the same time because when I search for a song it's hard to find it because a lot of songs have a similar name or when I'm searching for an artist but can't find the song because they have too many songs. please improve it.

the sound of clicking and sending voice notes got activated automatically after an update and there is no way to turn it down. Me and thousands more are getting crazy on the Internet, there is no way to solve it!!!! I have had my phone on vibrate for many years, no joke, I haven't had the sound activated in years, and it still makes sounds. even if I put it in silence mode where everything is muted, it still makes these sounds!! conversation tones are off and the app still makes the sounds!!

WhatsApp is by far the best messaging app. The only issues are: 1) we can no longer tell when audios are heard by receiver (not sure if theme color affects, but this is a big deal) 2) Info and copy options r in a menu instead of shortcut button at top (along w/reply etc), even though there's still space for it. Makes it inconvenient considering how often those features r used. 3) It would b MUCH better if the read/played time was a timestamp, instead of how long ago, so we don't have to the math

My experience with WhatsApp has been pleasant until very recently. Since the last update, when I share any link in a message, I can no longer add any caption or comment about the link before sharing (unlike before). From now on, I have to edit to insert commentary after sharing to say something about the link. Please fix this issue ASAP. Thanks.

This has the potential to be an amazing app, but it just has so many flaws. For starters, it only works and syncs all the messages about 5% of the time, which makes it rarely useful. I think the worst part is that it messes with WhatsApp notifications so much. I either don't even receive them, or get them about 3 days after they were sent (if I'm lucky). I tried many tricks to make it work again, but nothing seemed to fix it. I got notifications completely normally after I uninstalled.

I travel a lot so it's helped me keep in touch with ppl. The only complaint I have is that there are glitches with calling or text sounds. Quite often someone says they've been trying to call me and I see the notification but it didn't ring. Also, it would be nice if a deleted or edited message didn't say deleted /edited

Update mid '25. I have used WhatsApp for ages now, but still, they haven't sorted out yet a better solution for the storage of the media sent over the chats. Why a different folder for WhatsApp media? Why do you force me to have a photo I already have in my phone (because I took it) also in the "sent" folder as a duplicate? Also, the new video limit of size/duration is a nightmare. You don't even storage people's media, what's you problem? that's just annoying

It is basically the best communication app I've ever used since four years ago. I liked to create stickers and statuses for my family on my contacts. I can definitely texted myself to avoid accidentally texting somebody else so awkwardly. The only thing I dislike was when a random stranger called my number unexpectedly and I had to block him/her. I would recommend this app to anyone who wants to connect family and friends instantly. üëçüèªüíöüíØ

the app would be so much better if only the people programming wouldn't be brain dead and had the capacity to understand that, sometimes, phones break, and you just can't use them to transfer your "supposedly cloud-stored" backups to your new phone. The worst part is that they ask for your account to have access to you cloud storage, and they still don't grant you access to your previously saved backups from there. what is the gorram point then?

WhatsApp is one of the most reliable messaging apps out there. It‚Äôs fast, user-friendly, and works well even on slower networks. The end-to-end encryption gives peace of mind when it comes to privacy, and features like voice/video calling, media sharing, and status updates make it more than just a texting app. The interface is clean and easy to navigate. Group chats, broadcast lists, and voice notes are super convenient. WhatsApp Web is also a great addition for those who work on laptops.

WhatsApp is one of the most reliable and user-friendly messaging apps available today. It allows for fast and secure communication through text, voice calls, and video calls. The app is free to use and works smoothly on both Android and iOS devices. I especially like the end-to-end encryption, which gives me peace of mind knowing my chats are private.

Very good replacement for BB. Multiple recipients would be nice. Also. I have some issues when using multiple sim cards with which contacts can contact me on which number using the same installed app. Lastly. Please create a menu to refresh, update or delete certain contacts. Edit: update: 12 years later and looking back I can't even remember having these issues. TY WhatsApp for growing with time...

It was.. nice Now, it has become.. amazing. If I want to video Call my Family, then I would have to Message them first, Attempt to Audio Call once, Message again, Attempt to Video Call once again, Message again, Attempt to Audio Call once again & repeat many more times. After this, the Message is delivered & THEN I can video call my Family. Yeah.. Surprisingly, this Offer applies only when I want to call my Family. Restarting Phone doesn't help. Sometimes, I have to Normal Call. Thanks, Whatsapp

üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü Most useful messaging app ever! üí¨‚úÖ WhatsApp is my go-to app for chatting with friends, family, and classmates. It‚Äôs fast, simple, and works even on low networks üì∂üëè. I love features like voice messages, video calls, status updates, and group chats! üó£Ô∏èüìûüì∏ The new privacy settings and disappearing messages are great too üîí‚ú®. Very helpful for school work, daily chats, and sharing photos or documents easily üìöüìÅ. Only wish there were more fun themes or fonts, but overall it‚Äôs a must

This is an all round great app. Would be 5 stars but I have a major issue that started a while ago. About 2 days ago, after sending 2 videos successfully, no videos would send anymore. I cleared the cache, I deleted all the media in every "sent" folder in WhatsApp's media folder. And yet still, no videos want to send. it loads and keeps on loading, not even making progress, on my notifications bar it says for example "Sending 3 videos". But they don't. Truly disappointing WhatsApp.

The photo sending function is rather messed up after the update, despite clicking on "view more" to see all of my folders I only get a handful. Accidentally sending gifs while scrolling or without adding a caption is rather irritating due to the one click and send function and for the past few days whenever I search gifs I am met with "check your device's internet connection" which hardly goes away....

I've been using whatsApp for a while now, and it‚Äôs honestly one of the most convenient messaging apps out there. It‚Äôs super easy to use, and I like that everything is encrypted for privacy. Messaging, voice notes, video calls all work smoothly. Sharing photos, videos, and documents is quick too. Highy recommended

I used to appreciate this app alot, still do. But now that it's becoming very common for more and more people to use this app for calls aswell, it's become very obvious to me that -after all these years- the quality for voice calls is still unacceptable. There seems to be a constant risk of WhatsApp repeatedly "reconnecting to the network" even if both/all participants have full network signal. This applies to both, mobile internet aswell as WiFi. Very disappointing, would give 5* otherwise.

There should be an option to disconnect WhatsApp from Internet connection. Edit: It's a number based platform which allows to receive incoming calls, however scams and unwanted callers call too. There should be an option to stop receiving calls from unknown numbers. They can call/text us only if we allow them to. Without this feature it's getting dangerous to use this app, just can't switch because of official reasons.

New whatsapp updates have made it more difficult to send images through the app. Whatsapp only accesses my recent files or a select default folders which are not the same as my phone's albums, making it practically impossible to access any image that is not recent. This is extremely frustrating and makes whatsapp hard to use. The image access is the same for status updates or changing profile picture. I would prefer if sending images went back to the previous format of "recents" and "gallery".

I've never really had any problems with the app before and it's really good for everything, calling, messaging and so on but I noticed that recently whenever I try to post a video, not only is the video blurry but it takes long to send and not only that, it says didn't send. I don't blame this on the internet connection because it is working perfectly fine. I tried to post the same video multiple times but it just wasn't sending. It's really frustrating because I have reasons. Please fix this.

Love being able to download voice notes and listen during a hike without my phone. However, playback stops usually 5 mins in unless I switch focus to the app. Playback position is lost - wish there was a way to seek even if rough. Also can't seem to download voice notes longer than 30 mins or so, it just spins endlessly even in WiFi.

The app still serves its purpose, however, I'm not ok with the interface of the channel's & my status, its really challenging browsing through status plus, the timing, it doesn't load from the beginning, 3rd-4th status won't update, but the 5th upwards will start updating, I don't know why it's like that. kindly rectify. plus, I prefer the previous interface of the status. these channels are just complicating things.

A couple of annoying bugs have crept in recently, and it's impossible to report these problems. This is unacceptable for such a widely used app. On the Pixel Watch 3 one can choose to not receive notifications while the phone is open. This works in every app except WhatsApp, meaning that the watch vibrates with every message received, even as I'm replying to them. Annoying and a massive battery drain. Why is it so hard to report bugs?

Edit- Grateful for multiple accounts and lists. Have one more request..Would like to open WhatsApp with one of the lists I prefer on screen and not all chats as default. App is good. Just have a request. We need multiple accounts option on WhatsApp as we have for Instagram cz we have one number for work one for personal. And an invisible mode with specific contact selection just like status. And separate column for groups and personal chats. It's very difficult to handle both under one column.

They removed the "show notifications" option when muting a group. This is such a downgrade. Also, the limits to sharing and forwarding messages are horrible. Edit: Also, similar to Instagram, their features are so full of bugs that it seems only interns work on them. Restoring the chat history on another phone always fails after getting to 97%. Lost an entire day trying it.

While I like WhatsApp for the ability to call family and friends, the most annoying feature is the chat backup feature. Even though I have this feature turned off and don't want it, I keep getting reminders on my phone that my chats aren't backed up. Even following what is on the WhatsApp faq page, this still pops up on a daily basis. I would have scored more than 3 stars of this didn't bug me at all.

FIX THE BUG THAT FORGETS YOUR LOGIN AND FORCES YOU TO RESTORE EVERYTHING. On every device, "You have been logged out" without ANY reason. And how is it possible to have WhatsApp set to "daily" backups, and then the most recent backup is from over a month ago? A month of messages, images, docs, videos, just gone because your app can't even do a BASIC BACKUP properly. Garbage app. The only reason I keep using this thing is because other people.

For some reason my locked chats folder is no longer visible. The only responses I got from WhatsApp was from their bot, that after offering solutions that I tried and none worked said it was puzzled. Rather than a human agent entering the chat, the bot changed the subject and said that they don't provide support for the other subject that has nothing to do with my matter. Then it stopped responding. Do better WhatsApp. I have work-related chats I cannot access because of this failing.

I've been using Whatsapp as my main messaging app for more than 3 years now and all of the features with respect to communication are helpful. But ever since the update for channels was added, whatsapp has turned into a commercial app. It has lost the 'messaging app vibe'. And plus, I get a lot of explicit content on my account as well. I want to use Whatsapp for the purpose of communicating with people and contacting someone and not to entertain myself. I hope it gets removed.

Recently, I've been having issues with sending messages to specific chats. I will open one chat and send the message, and it shows that it went elsewhere. I literally almost sent sensitive information to the wrong person, and no, I'm not mistaking the chats. This has happened a few times

1. Issues with notifications and calls - they don't show up until the app is opened. There has been no notification about the calls at all for a long time. 2. The audio quality is terrible, to the point of just muffled noise. The background noise is too amplified. Please look into the matter :)

From my point of view, WhatsApp is a fantastic messaging app that makes it easy to stay in touch with friends and family. I appreciate its simplicity and the ability to send messages, share photos, and make voice or video calls for free. The end-to-end encryption gives me peace of mind about privacy. However, I also see the downside of constant notifications and the pressure to respond quickly. Overall, I think WhatsApp is a great tool for communication, as long as it‚Äôs used mindfully.

The latest update which involves channels on Whatsapp is frustrating. It's a good idea but the way it's being arranged makes the interface not user friendly. I prefer the former version. I hardly find the status I want because of this so called channels thing update. Edit: The rearrangement makes sense now. I can access my contacts status and other features with ease currently. Thanks for the update.

I hate to leave 1 star just to get someone's attention. but the recent update made any vertical video from the phone into incomprehensible mess. landscape mode video is fine. I don't know how to fix it. and as you know there isn't a way to downgrade WhatsApp into a previous stable version. so now I am stuck until someone know about this problem.

once again, i don't understand the unnecessary need to modernise and change everything in this app. the newest update changes the "typing..." feature into a text bubble instead, which was, AGAIN, completely unnecessary & looks off. why change something that worked perfectly fine before? features like this should be optional, as not everyone copes well with change. PLEASE have more regard for your users, if it's not broken stop fixing it. as soon as you get used to a layout, they change it AGAIN.

The app is great but then the problem comes at the statuses. When ever I send a picture or especially videos, WhatsApp completely changes the quality of the video and it's really irritating and annoying. I don't care about any changes WhatsApp makes but all I ask for is the ability to send videos in their original quality .üòêüòä. A new feature that must added is that we can now react to statuses. I mean like... HOW COOL WOULD THAT BE!!

WhatsApp is an amazing app; kudos to the brains behind it! However, I don't like how my contact status is displayed. I have to swipe over... contacts or search. I find that feature very annoying and stressful. Can it be rectified? If yes, please help! I'm dissatisfied at the moment. The feature came on in less than 24hours. I need help to get it back to how it was, I can't deal with this new feature displayed on my screen.

I didn't give 5 stars for one reason. When I try to use the app in landscape mode, it is always glitchy and barely works. But other than that, I'm fully satisfied. Edit: Now there is another issue, there is a new list feature that was released a few weeks ago. I only had it for about a week, and it was gone. I tried restarting my WhatsApp, deleting it, and installing it again. Nothing worked. If this could be resolved,I would appreciate it.

Hello, the latest WhatsApp update has introduced changes that I find quite inconvenient. Earlier, status updates were displayed in a straightforward vertical list, which I preferred. Now, they‚Äôre arranged in a horizontal format, which feels less user-friendly. Additionally, the Updates tab is now filled with channels and their options, which I don‚Äôt find useful. The previous design was simpler and more practical. I hope WhatsApp reconsiders and brings back the older layout. Thanks

Whatsapp is a very useful and amazing app... But this new update is insanely terrible. The status/updates section is now wack, I prefer the vertical look over the horizontal layout, and being able to sort of get a preview of the status before clicking. Etc. It would have been much better if status/updates and channels had separate sections, that way it would go back to having that iconic horizontal layout. And channels would be there for... Whoever needs it.

Was logged out suddenly with no explanation out of the app and now it won't even start. I've uninstalled it, cleared cache, everything, but it just won't start. And I can't log in anywhere else because of 2fa! WhatsApp please resolve this... Update: it appears all my chat history is gone due to an error retrieving the backup. I just can't believe it. I had the last memories of chats with relatives that are no longer with me there. Things that I will never get back again. I have no words...

I really love this Whatsapp. It's so easy to send messages to friends and family. Even forming groups on it is great. Posting status never made easier. You even have poll to vote for something in a group and you can edit messages with mistakes and you can check info to see how many members of a group saw your message. With Meta AI you can browse in a fun way! Whatsapp is the best app for fun chatting.

I have noticed lately that when I try to send something via my tab, which is connected to my phone, it shows my contacts are not synced. and plus i cant even add a contact with my tab, I have to add it with my phone only,so you should fix this problem very quickly to improve the condition of your ratings, other messenger apps are getting more than you. otherwise everything is good and fine, can be used for any type of call anywhere . I wrote this cause I thought you should know about the problem

title: Business in a Box
description:
All the templates you need to Start, Plan, Organize, Manage, Finance & Grow your business, in one place.

Business in a Box - The #1 Document Management Software!

Quickly and easily create any business or legal document with over 3,000 templates.

Business in a Box helps businesspeople get more done in less time. This do-it-yourself document templates software has been created to increase your productivity and efficiency, so you can invest the time and money you save into your business. Today, Business in a Box is used by more than 12 million entrepreneurs, business owners, managers, and executives in over 195 countries.

Business in a Box includes:
Business plan kit, financial statements, business policies and procedures, HR documents, contracts and agreements, board resolutions, letters and notices, checklists, forms ... and more.

Get organized with the Business in a Box Cloud Drive. Bring all your important files and folders together in one place.

Customize templates with the Business in a Box Editor, or use any other document editing software like Microsoft Word, Google Docs, or Pages.

Edit, store, share and collaborate on all your business files and folders.
descriptionHTML:
All the templates you need to Start, Plan, Organize, Manage, Finance & Grow your business, in one place.

Business in a Box - The #1 Document Management Software!

Quickly and easily create any business or legal document with over 3,000 templates.

Business in a Box helps businesspeople get more done in less time. This do-it-yourself document templates software has been created to increase your productivity and efficiency, so you can invest the time and money you save into your business. Today, Business in a Box is used by more than 12 million entrepreneurs, business owners, managers, and executives in over 195 countries.

Business in a Box includes:
Business plan kit, financial statements, business policies and procedures, HR documents, contracts and agreements, board resolutions, letters and notices, checklists, forms ... and more.

Get organized with the Business in a Box Cloud Drive. Bring all your important files and folders together in one place.

Customize templates with the Business in a Box Editor, or use any other document editing software like Microsoft Word, Google Docs, or Pages.

Edit, store, share and collaborate on all your business files and folders.
summary: The application is designed to help business people get more done in less time

scraped_reviews.content: I didn't purchase the paid subscription for a couple of reasons; #1 being that an annual plan is the only subscription type offered which totaled well over $200 I believe. Reason #2 is because I am a new freelancer and wouldn't consider my business needs to be as extensive as the target member of business-in-a-box. HOWEVER, I did spend nearly an hour browsing through every category and saw the immense template library and I can vouch that these tools are valuable X10!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for providing your valuable feedback! We're positive you will find several templates that will help you save time and money.

scraped_reviews.content: I bought a one year plan of this template suite and have downloaded a couple of templates for my project ..a total of 20 attempts including seveal failed attempts but I'm being prevented from further downloads on the excuse that I've exceeded the daily allowable limit of 50 downloads . How on earth does 20 equals 50? My computer stored them in my download folder!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We have not had this issue reported to us before, and we'd certainly like to work this through for you. Could you share the details at support@biztree.com? And any relevant screenshots would be immensely valuable. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: This is an incredibly useful app for seamless team communication! It offers a great range of features, including live calls, premade templates, and document editing for both Word and Sheets. It makes collaborating easy and efficient, keeping everyone on the same page. I highly recommend it for any team looking to improve productivity!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for downloading our app, Mubasher! We will keep working on it!

scraped_reviews.content: Downloaded this and immediately hit a blank white screen after the logo animation on my tablet. I downloaded it on my phone first, and it worked decently. But I wanted a bigger screen to explore the app. So... yeah.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We are investigating the issue.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a good software to use, It provides a lot of official documents. It helps you to accelerate your Business into professionalism. Although it doesn't have templates for Stealing or Dis-honesty policies. We need that on your next update
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for providing your valuable feedback. your document suggestions have been sent to the Editing Team. They will try to take them into account for future releases. Please reach out to us at support@biztree.com if you have other suggestions.

scraped_reviews.content: Do not try to made in-app purchase of this app you will blame yourself 1000 times. After I have made the in-app purchase payment the app is not accessible it is just rolling for hours you are still on it. More so, all the support from the developer is to no avail than 6 months now I'm unable to log in please don't be scammed. This app is a scam.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I'm sorry that you're having trouble with your app. However, we've tried our very best to help you and you have so far refused to cooperate. Please call us at +1-514-768-4100, or give us a number and time where we can reach you. We will walk you through steps to troubleshoot the issues.

scraped_reviews.content: Very good but needs to improve the app a lot when you accidently click on any forms and you click on back you will have to start again from the 1st form and go the the end their should be easy option and also read then download their should have been option to download all folders .
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We really appreciate your advice, and we will try to combine your feedback with our R&D, in order to provide a better product.

scraped_reviews.content: The diverse range of professionally designed templates saved me a lot of time and effort. I found exactly what I needed. Highly recommend for any business!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your review Naiden. Helping small businesses is part of our core values!

scraped_reviews.content: Business-in-a-Box is very convenient to use. Many my team mates are using this app and really like it. Thanks for publishing such kind of great app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear User, thank you very much for sharing your valuable & useful feedback. If you have other feedback or suggestions, please write to us at support@biztree.com. We would love to hear from you!

scraped_reviews.content: The app and the website both suck, you have to wait a 1000 years for it to login, it just keeps loading i don't have the time or patience to wait so long... Zero starts rating from me!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I'm sorry that you are having trouble with your app. Please clear the data and cache for your app by going to your phone settings. This should resolve your issue.

scraped_reviews.content: Templates aren't anything better than an English paragraphs with headings... Not that all sections are really relevant in what I tried for. It looks charges are too high... May be some flexibility is to be shown to take better scope among audience
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for providing your valuable feedback.

title: TripIt: Travel Planner
description:
Join nearly 20 million travelers on the world's highest-rated travel planner app for trip and itinerary organization!

TRAVEL ITINERARY

As soon as you book a flight, hotel, rental car or other travel plan, simply forward it to plans@tripit.com and we‚Äôll automatically add it to your comprehensive itinerary. Seamlessly sync travel plans to your calendar or share them with anyone you choose.

RESERVATION DETAILS

No more frantically searching through your inbox for important details about your travel plans, like when your flight gets in or the confirmation number for your hotel. Find them in a flash with TripIt ‚Äî even when you‚Äôre offline. 


Upload PDFs, photos, boarding passes, digital passport QR codes and more to your travel itinerary, so you can track everything in one place.


MAPS AND DIRECTIONS

The TripIt app includes all the map-related tools you‚Äôll need on-the-go (it‚Äôs great for road trips).

-	Plot out your entire trip on Google Maps or Apple Maps
-	Quickly pull up transportation options and driving directions between two points
-	Easily locate the closest restaurants, parking, ATMs and more


TRIPIT PRO

For roughly the price of checking your bags, upgrade to TripIt Pro to access exclusive travel perks all year long. When you upgrade, TripIt Pro will do all this for you (and more!):

‚Ä¢ Share real-time flight status alerts and check in reminders
‚Ä¢ Notify you if you're eligible for a refund if your fare price drops after booking
‚Ä¢ Track your reward programs and alert you if points are expiring
‚Ä¢ Navigate you through the airport with interactive maps


Your Google Play account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. Your TripIt Pro subscription will be good for 1 year, and automatically renew each year at $48.99 unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before your term ends. To manage your subscription, including auto-renew, visit your Play Store Account Settings.

FREE TRIPIT PRO FOR SAP CONCUR USERS

If your company uses SAP Concur, you may receive complimentary TripIt Pro benefits that most travelers have to pay for. Make sure you‚Äôre connected to TripIt to get itineraries created for you as soon as you book, and receive a complimentary subscription to TripIt Pro, if you‚Äôre eligible.

For more information, see the TripIt User Agreement (https://www.tripit.com/uhp/userAgreement) and Privacy Policy (https://www.tripit.com/uhp/privacyPolicy).

As soon as you book a flight, hotel, rental car or other travel plan, simply forward it to plans@tripit.com and we‚Äôll automatically add it to your comprehensive itinerary. Seamlessly sync travel plans to your calendar or share them with anyone you choose.

summary: TripIt¬Æ from Concur instantly organizes all your travel plans in one place.

scraped_reviews.content: App used to automatically import itineraries and send flight update notifications, but it no longer does any of this. After booking a trip a year ago, I added it to the app. Two months prior to departure, I got an email that our flight times changed. I opened the app to see if it updated with the new times but it didn't and I had to update manually. On the day of our flight, I didn't get a single notification about flight status or gate assignments. What is the point then?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Please contact our support team so we can investigate this further: https://help.tripit.com/en/support/tickets/new

scraped_reviews.content: 9/20/24: App won't open, keep having to uninstall. It's getting worse instead of better. Happy to be able to change the photo. Needs more trip activity options. I love that this syncs to my calendar and that I can add plans manually as well as add viewers/travelers. Sometimes the import information is a little mixed up but that's easy to fix. Overall a good app for traveling. 12/21/24: past trips aren't syncing to calendar if more than 90 days past.

Not very user friendly. I used to like the app a lot but recently it stopped automatically importing flight details from emails. It reads the first leg of the flight and the rest is lost. Adding flights manually is a poor experience, e.g. the default date for a new flight is today rather than the day of the flight that is already added to the trip.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, please contact our support team so we can investigate this: https://help.tripit.com/en/support/tickets/new

scraped_reviews.content: I've been a TripIt user for over 15 years and have been paying for pro for almost the entire time. The product quality and support has fallen apart over the last year and I'm now at the point where I'm seriously considering cancelling pro. They constantly have data outages where no flight data updates and I can't rely on it any longer. There's never any notification of these issues and support doesn't seem to really care.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please contact our support team so we can investigate this: https://help.tripit.com/en/support/tickets/new

scraped_reviews.content: Works great until it doesn't. Twice now in the middle of travel, the app logs me out and has an error when I try to log back in. Uninstalling and reinstalling doesn't help. The website won't let me log in, saying I'm trying to log in from an ineligible country. I'm in the US, and my VPN is off. If it was reliable I would give it a high rating. But reliability is key with something as important as a travel organizer.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please contact our support team so we can investigate this: https://help.tripit.com/en/support/tickets/new

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app. It makes trip planning very easy. Lodging, transportation tickets, route directions, restaurants, event tickets, travel documents all in one place. I especially like that the app automatically looks up addresses, web addresses, etc. for most attractions, restaurants, etc. and will populate many things like hotels and flights based on email confirmations, so itinerary planning is easy. Many other features. Worth the cost.

Update: It was fixed for a while but am again unable to upload photos or documents. Also was unable to add another loyalty account. And I'm grumpy at holiday discounts for new users as I pay full price for nearly 10 years. Deducted an additional star. Have used and loved it for years. Since I last updated cannot upload screenshots and have them save correctly. Super inconvenient since I save boarding passes there. Deducted a star.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, please contact our support team so we can investigate this further: https://help.tripit.com/en/support/tickets/new

scraped_reviews.content: Long time user and Pro subscriber here, I tell everyone about this app and have converted a ton of folks to using it. I've used this and paid for it for the better part of 14 years now and have had little bad to say about it. For some reason for the last month or two it just does not want to open on my S22+. It freezes on loading, crashes, doesn't show new trips, and is generally unresponsive. I've uninstalled and reinstalled it, no changes to this issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please contact our support team so we can look into this: https://help.tripit.com/en/support/tickets/new

scraped_reviews.content: Tripit's utility decreased significantly. Most often it shows 'No Plans', whether in the widget or app. If you have a good connection and time, the info will eventually appear, but the time window when the info is useful might pass. Cache cleaning, reinstallation, etc., do not help. If there were a good alternative, I would jump in no time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your patience while we worked on a fix. Please update your device to our latest app version (13.9.1) to resolve this issue.

scraped_reviews.content: Update- Clearing the app data, deleting the app, and reinstalling the app seems to have solved the problem. The Tripit app is fantastic. But like others, it has stopped working for me. Recently. When I tried to launch the app I get a message that the app has not responding and I have a choice of waiting or closing it. The widget does not display trips anymore. Enough people have said that they are having problems launching the app that a response to contact customer service is not useful.

Update: I updated the app and the issue still occurs. There is always a lag before trip items populate and the trip is missing most items while offline. Previous review: The app has gone downhill lately. I used to be able to view my itinerary quickly and when offline. After a recent update, this is no longer the case. Even when connected to the internet, my itinerary is often empty and I have to wait for it to populate. I have tried logging out/in. It happens for all trips.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please update your device to our latest app version 14.0 to resolve this issue. The latest TripIt app is rolling out over the next few days. If it‚Äôs not yet available to you in Google Play, it will be soon.

scraped_reviews.content: I have Tripit Pro and I can barely use the app. I keep getting the "Tripit isn't responding" error and the app runs really slow. Edit: After reading other reviews, I cleared the app data and reinstalled it. It seems to be working as expected now. Annoying I had to find that solution myself and go through the hassle of reinstalling it, but I'm happy it's working.

It does not sync with Google Calendar. It's very old school. You have to put in the details of every restaurant, hotel, flight, etc. it does not put in any info for you. None of the addresses I have put in can be found on the app. It's like a piece of digital paper you fill in with your details, which is not what I wanted. I wanted one place to store info for my trip so that I don't double book accommodations. I wanted to see it on a calendar layout, which this app does not offer.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please make sure you've selected 'Include detailed items in calendar feed'. If you need further assistance, please contact us: https://tripit.freshdesk.com/en/support/tickets/new

scraped_reviews.content: I have had this app since 2018, and it has tracked all my trips. Two months ago, I realized it stopped tracking my trips. I tried to sync, and it wouldn't, although the settings said it was. I sent several emails to support with no response. I sent my latest trip, but it was not added. Now, I must figure out how to export my trips and find another application to add them.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please contact our support team so we can investigate this further: https://help.tripit.com/en/support/tickets/new

scraped_reviews.content: Updated - Needs a lot of work. It should provide boarding passes after they are sent to tripit. It doesn't let you enter your phone number from your phone (laptop works). Not even from desktop mode on phone because it does it "automatically". Except it doesn't. It also won't let you delete a single flight that it has in error. The app is okay at finding flights in email though. It couldn't see one leg of my trip, is there a maximum of 5 flights?

Lots of bells and whistles but... It's great that this app automates many of the tedious tasks of travel planning but what I wanted was a tool to manage tickets and QR codes for all of the activities for a family of 4 on a tour of Italy. Adding events to an itinerary is easy but the free app limits the number of documents one can attach to a trip to three. Really? Paying for the pro version will allow one to add up to 25 documents but even that is restrictive. Disappointing. And unnecessary.

Sent email to customer service about - Unable to create an account. Keep getting error that password must be 8 - 64 characters. After I posted 1-star review, they responded in about 30 minutes asking me to send them email. Again within 30 minutes, they responded with a solution that fixed problem. I can now log in without any problem. Thanks for quick response. I gave app rating of 3 stars until I use it for a few days.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please contact our Support team via our Help page so we can help you get started: https://help.tripit.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

scraped_reviews.content: Ever since I downloaded this app, it has become integral to my trips. Previously, I had to make my own list from scratch, juggle several websites, and put all my locations in Google maps to effectively manage my itinerary. This has changed all of that for the better. I do wish that the email sync worked a little bit better, but forwarding is an option when it doesn't so I am still able to easily get everything I have planned for my trips in one place.

Didn't end up using this app much at all once we were traveling and I can't figure out how to cancel the paid Pro version. The instructions they give on how to cancel are inaccurate. Will probably have to dispute with credit card company if I don't get a response today before I get billed tomorrow. So don't go Pro because it's a trap even though they say you have 30 days to cancel!

I love this app, but one thing I wish it would do is 'grab' screenshots of bording passes. Some airline apps / websites show you this image, but you have to be logged in to see it. Invariably, when you need it most, your log in had timed out and you have to scurry to log back in. The app doesn't need a log in, so if the image was saved there it'd be much faster to recall. I don't want to use a dozen apps when I am rushing through an airport. If I could keep it all in one that'd be awesome. Also, the "miles traveled" function in the Travel Stats part of the user profile doesn't seem to work, it says I've traveled zero miles...but it also lists 6 trips and 10 cities visited. The miles traveled part would be kind of fun to track, so it's a bummer that it doesn't seem to work.

I'm Permanently deleting this app after giving it many opportunities to redeem itself. However, I can't abide the near constant errors it makes in in my itineraries. It misinterprets the itineraries and emails (for example, from airlines) and then gives false information about departure times, arrival times, airports, etc. The only thing I expect from this type of app is my ability to rely on it to give me correct information. This one just doesn't give that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please check your email for feedback from the TripIt Support team.

scraped_reviews.content: Seems ok as far as importing data, but I was looking for an app for a group trip, with group chat, friend finder, polling options. I feel like I could do everything this app does with Google calendar and sharing. I am sure this app makes it easier for most people, but, for me, easier would mean one single app that can coordinate our group's plans before AND during the trip.

At first the app was working fine. Downloaded the confirmations from the email and placed it in the app. Accuracy was not and is not its strength. Lately it has been deteriorated. It gives very basic info i.e FROM and TO. date, hour and that's it. ALL the rest is up to you to add, edit etc. Even worse: For some unexplained reasons it does not recognize vendors like Vacation-To-Go. And even when sending them the itinerary confirmation email to them-they DO NOT add it. SHAME! No one to talk to
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please contact our support team so we can look into this: https://help.tripit.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

scraped_reviews.content: love this app!!! I have been using the good old reliable paper and pen to plan my dream trip to South Korea for years. I had actually lost the "itinerary" once, so I decided to look for a digital version to keep track. Now I also have a visual idea of the places I want to go and the distance from one place to the other. Building my itinerary has never been easier! Can't wait for my tripüíú

3 1/2 stars. Pretty good app, useful info all in one place, but not quite intuitive enough. It made it harder than necessary to find how to change my email address for instance. Also one of my flights is flagged "at risk," but provides me no information on what that means. You should be able to just click on that flag and get an explanation. And, I upgraded to TripIt pro but don't see any way to convert my regular TripIt app account to the pro level.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. For details on the At Risk message: please see our help page: https://help.tripit.com/hc/en-us/articles/226107427.There is not a unique Pro or basic TripIt app.Our app serves as a portal to your TripIt account. If you are not seeing your Pro upgrade, contact our Support Team: https://help.tripit.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

scraped_reviews.content: I've only had it a short time. I like the way it puts together the itinerary from the confirmations. It puts new confirmations right in the right spot of the itinerary without me having to move them. ....updated rating based on later versions. This prodict has regressed in the way it captured basic info about multi-airline itinereries. Does not allow multiple confirmation numbers, and mixes up multiple ticket and rewards numbers. I guess it's OK for simple domestic trips, but who needs an app for that?

I think this app is great for keeping track of all your flights, hotels, and rental cars! Every confirmation number, phone number, terminal & gate, arrival/departure time, check-in/check-out time, address, etc. all at your fingertips. One thing I'd like to see improved is being able to add other traveler names (not viewers) without them having their own account. Being able to add boarding pass images for scanning, as others mentioned, would also be great. Overall, I love it!

UPDATE: This app has started freezing and stopping recently making it very difficult to fine tune our plans for our upcoming trips. Very disappointing! I love using TripIt to plan and keep my vacations organized. I can send my reservation emails to the app and they are automatically imported. The details of my itinerary are available to me on or offline, and I can add other travelers to my trips so they know what our plans are for each day. It's one of my favorite apps ever!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please contact our Support team via our Help page: https://help.tripit.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

scraped_reviews.content: Great, when it works ... but in the past two weeks, it shuts down as soon as it opens. I un/reinstalled and it still shuts down. I don't want to look for an alternative ... I would just like this to work properly. Edit: I did contact support and they said they 'could not reproduce the problem.' My phone meets the specified requirements and the app worked until the last upgrade. Same phone, different programming ... hmmm, wonder why it doesn't work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So we can review, please contact us via our Help page: https://help.tripit.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app! I travel frequently and use it to manage all of my plans. It's terrific to have everything stored in one place, in such an easy to read itinerary. TripIt's notifications are fantastic, and often arrive before my airline notifies me of any delays (how do they do it?). It also provides other information that travel companies usually don't, such as which terminal I'm departing from and where to pick up my bag. The points and document trackers are also helpful. I'm hooked on TripIt!

App keeps freezing after editing trip and I have to lock my screen and then unlock just to be able to close the app. I wouldn't use it except for the fact it has the simplest and easiest way for the parents of 20 students to see the info on a trip abroad I'm organizing. Pain for me but provides the best way to view for them. I have a Samsung Note 10+. Just as a note, the web version appearance is unsightly and overly complicated. If it had the same kind of view as the app, I'd stick with that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please contact our Support team via our Help page: https://help.tripit.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

scraped_reviews.content: The itinerary for the flight works decent. Now, the "enter name" for hotel location and car rental for example, it would be nice to have the cursor in the field already rather than having to touch the field. For the names and fields, please have the field auto-capitalize the first letter automatically :) Otherwise, the search feature works well only typing say the "Hotel Name" with street number generally pops up the information quickly. I think the overall UI for each section such as car rental, flights, etc can use more icons and colors. It looks a little bland. Overall functionality compared to other trip planner app seem to work well so giving it 4-stars. Looking forward to more improvements! Thanks :D

I've been using their service for years and I'm still using their service. Sure there may be some things here and there that could be improved, and airlines have matched some functions for the traveler, but group travel, sharing plans with people at destinations, consolidated itinerary for numerous events and activities is outstanding. I strongly recommend their service to everyone I encounter on my travels.

I really like this app. I do with you could attach more than 3 documents to your trip. I do also wish there was more color/customization on the display of your trip schedule. It is bland and kind of crammed together so reading it can be meh if you have a lot of similar things planned around each other. The user experience can be improved, but for a free app I love it and it does most of what I need.

I love this app and have been using it for years but lately there are glitches w items around unfiled not being added to trips even after inputting all the information and the app saying it will associate it to that trip. I pay for the full app so it's been frustrating when it doesn't work because filling in details is time consuming. Fix that and it would be 5 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please contact our support team so we can investigate this further: https://help.tripit.com/en/support/tickets/new

scraped_reviews.content: Emailed support and they didn't read it, just reset my password which was annoying. If you try to use on a desktop you'll be prompted to make another log in after you've already logged in. Works fine on mobile. Very tedious entering in information, you have to move things once at a time and cannot just switch entire days. Overall disappointed so far.

The concept and premise of this application is very good but it only works occasionally. It doesn't sync up with the website and lets you down when you need it the most. I subscribed to the Pro version. Very disappointed. The play store automatically updated the version to 13.5 which seems to have this "infinite loop" problem while syncing trips. I rolled back into 13.4.1 and that fixed the problem.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please contact our support team: https://help.tripit.com/en/support/tickets/new

scraped_reviews.content: I have used this app since 2011. I love this app and would give it 10 stars if I could! I travel nearly every week. I book a flight, rental car and hotel and within minutes I get a notification that the itinerary was received. You can open the app and it's all there and that's all I need. To boot it keeps track of your travel stats year to year and all time. Every air mile, every city and every country I've visited since I started using the app. Great Job Tripit!

TripIt often gets me update info -- gate changes, delays, etc -- even before the dedicated airline apps do. Amazing and appreciated! The constantly updated itinerary also is wonderdul as it keeps all of each journey's consolidated info in one place in chronological order and allows for edits, too. So handy and can be printed out in case one is without internet and/or WiFi. A fan? Absolutely!!!

Used to love TripIt and was a longtime user, but a few days ago, it just kept crashing in the background every 5 minutes. This kind of stuff is unacceptable, and the only way to get the attention of their development team is to uninstall the app and punish them with a poor Play Store rating. And no, I'm not contacting customer support - you already know about the problem. Do something to fix it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: An update is available that fixes the bugs that caused the app to crash for some of our users.  Please make sure you have updated to TripIt Android app v8.2.1.

scraped_reviews.content: I love Tripit. You can put your entire itinerary in to your trip including flights, hotel reservations and event info restaurants etc. ; your entire trip in 1 place. So fun and it stores your past trips so you can recall and revisit places you loved. I've had it for several years and i can't say enough good things about it. You can also allow others to see you itinerary as well.

Using TripIt has made organizing my itineraries way easier. I like that I can book flights, hotels, tours, etc... on different websites and have one central app to see it all. There's occasionally a glitch when a company (airline, hotel, etc...) sends multiple confirmations or updates that causes TripIt to double-book the activity. That's my only problem after using this for 5'ish years.

This is one of the most amazing data integration apps I have seen. By gathering data from multiple sources in real time (flight timing and delays, traffic delays, airport security wait times) they can calculate how long you need and notify you "go now". This Pro feature is well worth the money for frequent travelers and also check with your employer if they already have a license as many do. On top of that there are nice things for international like pictures of the foreign plugs etc

I travel for work and my company installed this on my phone, signed me in and now it just magically lets me know where I'm headed next. The other day I had a layover and enjoyed having a nice map showing me where to go through the terminal to get to my next plane. Not sure how long that's been there but, awesome! Next they need to add AR as an option. Also, notifications when your gate changes is fantastic as well. Just a really great, helpful app.

I've used this app on at least three trips abroad. It is very useful for keeping track of time, locations I want to visit, and planning routes between activities. They just recently added a really great feature which shows the activities on Google Maps. You can go through your schedule, day by day, and plan the best route to get the most out of your trip. I've had almost no issues with the forwarding email. The app does a great job with finding the relevant information in the received email.

I've been using it for even more years now. Still really love it. The ability to aggregate all my travel in one itinerary by emailing all my confirmation emails is great. My company now give me the pro version, which had saved me more than cost (had i paid it). if you travel even somewhat frequently, it's likely worth the upgrade.

I took a much more complex trip than I usually get recently - 3 cities, 5 hotels, trains and planes and car rentals and taxis.. Booked either directly or through at least 2 agencies, by either one of two people. It'd have been a nightmare to keep track of all that manually. I frequently had to edit details after imperfect pickup from confirmation emails, but at least the basics were there. Tripit made the whole endeavor MUCH smoother, I won't attempt travel without it in the future.

Tripit works really well. It seamlessly incorporates virtually all email confirmations into a well organized itinerary. Adding and editing entries or additional information is easy and quick. If I was still working, I'd use the Pro version but I don't really need all of the additional features. I have used it more than 5 times a year for many years, highly recommended!

This is a great app for keeping trips organized and it points out where you might have a gap in your plans. This is helpful to me as I don't want to miss the little details before traveling abroad and possibly being in areas with spotty wifi service. I don't want to be outside of the airport, trying to find a train or taxi into town at the last minute, especially when the airports are about an hour from the city center in Paris & Rome. This app helps me to fill the gaps ahead of time!

I've been using Blur for a few years, since it was purchased, and have started paying annually out of principle. It lets you have tons of burner email addresses, and gives you full control over your mailbox. Additionally, they (to the best of my knowledge) have ever sent an email trying to talk me into buying the program that I'm aware I use frequently; hence, the purchase. In the age of spam and abused email addresses, this is a service that I've personally turned all of my friends and family on to, and would recommend that to anyone else as well.

title: Spotify: Music and Podcasts
description:
With the Spotify music and podcast app, you can play millions of songs, albums and original podcasts for free. We have even added audiobooks, so you can enjoy thousands of stories wherever you are!

Stream music and podcasts, listen to audiobooks, discover albums, playlists or even single songs for free on your mobile or tablet. Subscribe to Spotify Premium to download and listen offline wherever you are.

Spotify gives you access to a world of free music, curated playlists, artists, and podcasts you love. Discover podcasts, new music, top songs or listen to your favorite artists and albums.

WHY SPOTIFY FOR MUSIC AND PODCASTS?
‚Ä¢ Listen to over 80 million songs and 4 million podcasts (and counting)
‚Ä¢ Enjoy over 300,000 newly added audiobook titles
‚Ä¢ Discover new music, albums, playlists and original podcasts.
‚Ä¢ Search for your favorite song or artist by typing a lyric
‚Ä¢ Enjoy amazing sound quality on music and podcasts across all devices.
‚Ä¢ Create and share your own music playlists to suit your mood or discover other playlists you might like.
‚Ä¢ Listen to daily music mixes made just for you.
‚Ä¢ Explore top songs from different genres, countries or decades.
‚Ä¢ Subscribe to your favourite podcasts so that you never miss an episode, then curate your very own podcast library.
‚Ä¢ Bookmark individual podcasts into Playlists
‚Ä¢ Listen to music and podcasts on your mobile, tablet, desktop, PlayStation, Chromecast, TV, Wear OS or wearable device.

Listen and discover the latest music from artists like;
‚Ä¢ Bad Bunny
‚Ä¢ Billie Eilish
‚Ä¢ Renzo Pianciola
‚Ä¢ The Temper Trap
‚Ä¢ Harry Styles

Listen to your favorite music artists all day every day via the Popular Radio playlist feature. Here are just some of the artists we‚Äôve already curated;
‚Ä¢ Taylor Swift
‚Ä¢ Drake
‚Ä¢ Eminem
‚Ä¢ Coldplay
‚Ä¢ Paolo Nutini
‚Ä¢ Fleetwood Mac

Listen to over 40 category genres - New Releases, Charts, Live Events, Made for You, At Home, Only You, Summer, Pop, Workout, Hip-Hop, Mood, Party, Pride, Dance/Electronic, Alternative, Indie, Equal, Wellness, Rock, Frequency, R&B, Disney,, Throwback, Radar, Chill, Sleep, In the car, Kids & Family, Caribbean, Classical, Romance, Jazz, Instrumental, Afro, Christian and Gospel and Country.

Listen to popular and exclusive podcasts like;
‚Ä¢ The Joe Rogan Experience
‚Ä¢ Modern Wisdom
‚Ä¢ 2 Bears, 1 Cave with Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer
‚Ä¢ Call Her Daddy and Crime Junkie

Search, discover and play music, podcasts and audiobooks from all over the world for free, anywhere, anytime or create your own music playlists with the latest songs to suit your mood.

WHY GO PREMIUM?
‚Ä¢ Listen to albums and playlists without ad breaks.
‚Ä¢ Download and listen to music and podcasts offline, wherever you are.
‚Ä¢ Jump back in and listen to your top songs with on-demand playback.
‚Ä¢ Choose from 4 subscription options ‚Äì Individual, Duo, Family, Student. There‚Äôs no commitment and you can cancel any time

Audiobooks in Premium currently available in Australia, the UK & the US. Discover 250,000+ titles, 15 hours/month of available listening for Premium Individual subscribers and Duo & Family plan managers.

Experience Spotify on your Wear OS device:
‚Ä¢ Enjoy your favourite music and podcasts without having your phone around.
‚Ä¢ Control playback on your phone or any of your Spotify compatible devices.
‚Ä¢ Download your favourite content for offline listening on the go (Premium only).
‚Ä¢ Get instant access to Spotify with our Tiles and Complications.

Please note: This app features Nielsen‚Äôs audience measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, such as Nielsen‚Äôs Audio Measurement. If you don't want to participate, you can opt-out within the app settings. To learn more about our digital audience measurement products and your choices in regard to them, please visit https://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.
