Welcome to Learna ‚Äì the AI-Powered Language Learning App to Learn English or Spanish!

Looking to learn English or learn Spanish fast and effectively?
Learna is your all-in-one AI language tutor app, designed to help you speak confidently from day one. Practice English or Spanish with interactive grammar lessons, real conversation practice, vocabulary builders, pronunciation tools, and fun reading exercises. Whether you're a beginner or brushing up your skills, Learna helps you master every aspect of the language‚Äîat your own pace.

With Learna AI, you can speak English & Spanish confidently and effectively through interactive conversations. Our app takes your language learning journey beyond traditional methods. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, Learna AI is here to help you learn, speak English and Spanish in a fun, engaging, and personalized way.

Language practices and pronunciation lessons are guided by our Learna AI Virtual Chat Character, offering tailored support as you learn more about speaking, pronunciation and accent training. You can speak with AI to improve both your speaking, pronunciation and listening skills. The app provides real-time feedback, helping you speak correctly and refine your vocabulary as you go. This makes learning English & Spanish more dynamic, interactive, and efficient, as you can practice speaking at your own pace.

Learna AI also focuses on improving your grammar skills . You‚Äôll learn essential grammar rules and practice them through a variety of exercises that help reinforce your understanding. The grammar practices are designed to gradually improve your proficiency, allowing you to speak with accuracy and clarity. As you learn grammar, you will build a stronger foundation for your speaking and writing skills.

Vocabulary plays a critical role in learning and speaking languages fluently. With Learna AI, you can improve your vocabulary by learning new words and phrases that are practical and useful in daily conversations. Each lesson focuses on building your vocabulary, ensuring you have a broad range of words at your disposal. The app features vocabulary practice that adapts to your level, helping you speak more naturally and confidently.

Your pronunciation also gets a boost with Learna AI. As you speak, you‚Äôll receive valuable feedback to improve your pronunciation. The app includes pronunciation exercises specifically designed to help you master English and Spanish pronunciation, and therefore speak clearly. Pronunciation practices allow you to correct mistakes and sound more authentic and fluent when speaking languages like English and Spanish.

Track your progress with detailed performance metrics and milestones. Set learning goals to monitor your achievements and celebrate your successes. With continuous practice, you‚Äôll see your speaking skills improve, and your vocabulary will expand. By setting specific goals, you ensure that each practice session is focused and effective.

Learna AI Language Tutor Features

- Language Conversation Practice with Learna AI
- Get feedback from Learna AI for your mistakes
- Learn English or Spanish Grammar with tailored lessons
- Improve your English & Spanish Reading Skills
- Enrich your Vocabulary with daily vocabulary practices & Learn new words
- Spelling Check and vocabulary reinforcement
- Perfect your Pronunciation through interactive pronunciation exercises
- Enhance your Speaking Skills through practical speaking practice
- Track your progress and set goals to continually improve

Speak, practice, and learn languages today with Learna AI, your partner in mastering the English language, and Spanish language!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/learna.ai/
summary: Speaking English & Spanish Made Easy! Learn, Speak & Practice Languages with AI.

scraped_reviews.content: I do not recommend this app, the voice recognition works horribly if you do not speak in a high tone or if you speak very quickly. The app itself is very limited. It seems that it has a good base, but I literally could not use it for more than 5 minutes because it told me that to continue I had to pay. For that, I better use other apps that, although they offer paid versions, are usable in their free plan.

Horrible Spanish Accent. This AI may be best for only learning English. And once you set your language level at the beginning. It doesn't allow you to advance once you realize you are more advanced than the lesson. You still have to go through the levels until it catches up to your actual level. And if you used advanced language it asks you to stick to what it asked you to repeat.

What makes this app worth using is its personalized learning path, which covers a wide range of topics. However, I‚Äôve noticed a few weaknesses: 1) It‚Äôs not suitable for pronunciation practice. 2) After completing the learning path, there was nothing else to do until it was updated several weeks later. 3) The app often auto-translates my voice into the local language, and then the AI lecturer asks me to repeat my response in English. This has happened multiple times‚Äîvery annoying.

not great at all. the spanish accent is terrible. the app cannot understand my speaking voice. it Only responds to the script, so I can't make corrections. I can not change it to latin american spanish and even though I only used it for two days. it will not let me cancel. what good is it to practice with such a terrible accent and inability to hear me.

I've bought it for a little over 9,000. But it's such a useless app that even though I've paid money, I don't want to use it at all, I bought it for a month in another app called "My Sivi", I liked it a lot, because it's very interesting, there are different subjects, different ways to teach it. In summary, I don't recommend even one percent to anyone who wants to buy it.

it started off great but then it began to move to fast through the lessons. I never got anything down packed as a complete understanding so that I could remember it. This app seems more built for people who have some basic understanding of the language they are trying to learn.

Started at beginner level because it doesn't give you a test to see where your understanding of the language is. jumped right into full sentences. Had an idea what it was saying, but did not explain the sentences or the structure. In addition, It's not conversational Mexican Spanish. I dont know anyone who speaks like this. Meaning, I will be learning words and phrases that I will have to discard

it doesn't work. everytime I try to use the microphone it crashes. support hasn't been very helpful. permission was given, app was deleted and reinstalled 2x - it just doesn't work. don't waste your time or $
It doesn't pick up my voice very well and puts words out that I didn't say, or will respond with "Inaudible Speech". Also, the app freezes at times and I have to swipe it out and restart it.
app kept misunderstanding what I was saying and was saying I pronounced everything wrong wouldn't pay 7 a week for something that cant even get pronunciations right

I have payed but i didn't access the service, It is difficult to say is a scam because I used this app before and after payment I accessed the service but today I just payed then after no access and no history to show my payment while my money already deducted.
I paid $40 and the app stopped working. I Uninstalled and Now is working again. But it is very disappointing.
this is not a conversation with ai. it's just a simple chat with a bot that doesn't understand speech very well. it's also paid. it's better to talk to chatGPT.
AI apparently doesn't understand anything you say. It misinterprets even basic words like "Hola" or "Si" and into "Hoha" "Ni" and makes u get all the answers wrong. Duolingo 100% better.
It is quite good talking with your own tutor in the language you have chosen yourself, but i can't take my lessons, they all need to be paid money for.
The teaching is good but the pronunciation of the spanish is terrible. You can not learn to speak correctly and pronounce correctly with this app.
Can't use the app with Bluetooth headset. Can't hear anything when app talks to me. Send request to support team, no response yet. I am going to cancel my subscription.
It's very useful to learning any language and build our confidence. I am very thankful to this app because from this app I can learn any types of language and all thanks for that üôè

Just started - went through the initial setup and selections, but right after I was greeted to begin and I adjusted my phone microphone to be enabled "While using this all" - AI instructor volume dropped from 100% down to maybe 20% and doesn't allow me to adjust higher so that I can hear her better. I have difficulty hearing so this is a huge hit on my personal experience with this app. I'll continue to work through and see if it gets any better.

Nice concept, but it needs work. The AI doesn't pronounce the Spanish words correctly, so how could someone who didn't know this learn to say words correctly? Also, when using the microphone to speak back to the AI, it frequently misunderstands completely what was said no matter how slow and clearly I pronounced the phrase, which makes the answers wrong. Wish it worked better, but I canceled and am deleting the app.
the Ai does not recognize very well the words I want to say. it makes me repeat many times. and I started feeling frustrated.

Update: Now the login screen doesn't even work. How could have 10 million people download this waste? Those have to be fake numbers. it doesn't let me get past the part where you put in your name. there's also no way for me to go to a menu or anything like that. Super buggy, super cheap, super NO for my. How do I even cancel my subscription now if I can't get to any menu? And please don't even respond by telling me to email support. you don't care so stop acting like you do.
it is good and user-friendly my only problem is that I don't have a credit or debit card to subscribe which will make learning difficult for but with time I will get over it.

hate her voice. how do I get a refund, she hurts my ears. there's no way I can listen to her, no response from developers, no refund, no way to switch out AI mentor, the advertisement way blonde and sounded different. app is not easy to use. really don't want it but since I cant get a refund I will force myself to use it. yuck. wait for a better option. this sucks
It's not free; it asks you to pay more than it teaches you. There are much better programs; it doesn't deserve a rating.
the way I've started, hoping to improve English proficiency levels and create a convenience conversation with others
it's not working in Afghanistan or there are some other issues. it's not continuing after being downloaded
I can't try the free version for 7 days, and I still have to choose a payment method, even though this is my free trial.
definely UNINSTALL. if you chose your native language as English you only have 3 options of languages that you could learn. ENGLISH SPANISH AND FRENCH.
Learna it's a good app, it's corrects where you make a mistake and I like it being corrected.
that's good app I was learning English since 2017 I didn't find someone to practice with I think it's a good app I like it recommended to Avery Lerner new language to enjoy this app
it's a fantastic app for learning English when I login I can't speak hi or hello now I'm speaking and writing a little bit fluently

The app has problems with the sound. the speaking is not natural when the speaker is connected to a USB. I can't hear the teacher and I have to wait until the app reads and writes my words. This is bad experience, and my refund is out of time.
I really love this and getting better at learning Spanish but I don't like that its only 50 seconds 4 stars
it's very good and easy to used it when you subscribe it ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞

so far, it's 3 stars,I believe the response through the microphone should be instant. Instead, you have to hold and speak, and it doesn't respond what you actually said. Also, the accent of the AI sounds to pocha(american). I can't understand the task at hand.
It is uncomfortable to press the button for each answer. Is it possible to cancel it and talk with the tutor directly?

I'm so so glad and grateful, cause I found this app because it's incredible. With "Learn English" I can speak freely wherever and whenever I want. I used to pay for English courses at academies and wasn't learning anything...

"I have a problem with the app. For some time now, it keeps freezing and doesn‚Äôt let me continue with the lessons. I‚Äôve already tried all the recommended solutions, including the absurd one of changing my password (which makes no sense to me). There‚Äôs no accessible support page, and I can‚Äôt find a solution. Where can I contact someone to resolve this issue?"

Today 6/7/2025 I activated the free trial option for Learna app to check how this app works and I used it just for a few minutes and I believe this app does not work for me, so I tried to cancel the trial subscription but despite them indicate that you can cancel before your trial period ends to avoid automatically charges on your credit card looks like that it is impossible, there is not an option for that. It is easy to join but difficult to cancel.
one of the best app for learning any language

I bought the one week version. I don't like it for 2 main reasons. It's only text driven, so it can't catch your pronunciation and correct it. Secondly, you can't start a chat in a freely way: no matter what subject I need to address you have always start by a learning path topic and then kinda divert it. The only pro: I have to say that the transcription of your vocals is very accurate.
It's not good for learning Spanish. The pronunciation is horrible. It's not even close. The voice recognition doesn't even recognize what I said. And can't use the app more than five minutes.
this seemed like a great, interactive way to practice conversational skills with AI... it's really just a glorified chatbot which hits you with a pay wall after about 3 minutes of use
this is good to learn English it's so fun but when it comes to time it's a little

They are one thieves canceled My subscription because I did not use it and I also did not want the automatic payment and not make a refund I used the application only once and canceled and asked for my refund of one nor did I get to complete the 3 day of the pro thieves.
Actually ma time is not enough because the 5 minutes is given for at least half an hour otherwise the app is good ‚ù§Ô∏è
I love anything AI it's great learning from themit is easy to learn and fun to do I highly recommend it
Application does not work microphone constantly says can't understand or speak clearly.
Great but I think it's rather putting money first user should be allowed to use the app first for a month before asking for payment

title: VK Video: movies, cartoons, TV
description:
Watch movies, cartoons, TV series and shows online & offline on any device. Enjoy premieres and blockbusters from movie theaters and online platforms right on your device!

Discover entertainment without limits with VK Video. There, you‚Äôll find online TV programs, new releases of films and TV series, educational and entertaining videos, cartoons for kids (offline), exclusive content and sports broadcasts. 

Watch everything and more:
‚Ä¢ Regular headline premieres of Russian and foreign films, which are released on our platform before anywhere else
‚Ä¢ TV series that revolutionized the industry and became lasting classics, as well as trending new releases from different genres worthy of discovering

title: NPR: National & Local News
description: Welcome to the public radio universe. The NPR app is the best way to get the latest news of the day, deep-dives on important topics that broaden your world, and the quirky, fun stories you'll want to share with your friends ‚Äì all in one place. Make it personal. Play NPR One on the Home screen to get a personalized, continuous stream of shows, news, headlines, and music from every corner of public radio. Listen to what you want to, skip what you don‚Äôt. Or add a story you find interesting to your playlist. Your mix will be personalized to deliver the NPR you want, while still serving you stories you didn‚Äôt know you‚Äôd love. Broaden your podcast palate. Head to the ‚ÄòPodcasts‚Äô tab to listen to shows from across public radio, recommended for you by our team of expert editors. (Don't forget to enable notifications to stay on top of your new favorites.) Make us your music concierge. Watch Tiny Desk Concerts in full right on the app. Just tap the tab labeled ‚ÄòMusic,‚Äô and hit play to soak in live performances from music‚Äôs favorite office space. You can also stream music from around the country, browse the latest music headlines, dig into reviews, and more. Make everywhere more interesting. Connect NPR to your speakers wherever you are, via Chromecast, AirPlay, Apple CarPlay, or Bluetooth. Login or register for a free NPR account, then just say "Alexa, play the news from NPR," to have your app listening experience amplified. Support your listening, and NPR. The NPR app is free and will always be. If you want to get even more out of your listening experience while supporting public media, consider joining NPR+. You‚Äôll get perks like sponsor-free podcast listening, bonus content, archive episodes, and early access to select shows. Learn more at plus.npr.org. Data Protection Choices: At NPR, we understand how important privacy is to you, and we are committed to transparency about how we collect, use and share your information. Please take a moment to read our privacy policy: https://n.pr/privacypolicy. By downloading this app: You agree to NPR‚Äôs terms of use, available at https://n.pr/termsofuse. You acknowledge that NPR may process your personal data as described in NPR‚Äôs privacy policy, available at https://n.pr/privacypolicy. You agree that NPR uses devices, identifiers, tracking technologies, and information about the device you use to access NPR‚Äôs apps to enhance your viewing, listening, and user experience, personalize content, personalize messages from NPR‚Äôs sponsors, provide social media features, and analyze NPR‚Äôs traffic. This information is shared with social media services, sponsorship, analytics, and other third-party service providers. See details in NPR‚Äôs privacy policy.
