To make reading fun, HOMER includes popular phonics and literacy activities such as Power Word Puppy, Power Word Cake, and Letter Jam, which help kids practice letters, sight words, and vocabulary through interactive play.
More Than Reading: A Complete Early Learning Program
While reading is at the core, HOMER also supports all-around growth:
 üî¢ Math Games for Kids ‚Äì Numbers, counting, shapes, patterns, problem-solving. Favorites like Taco Turtle‚Äôs Pizzeria, Biggest Bubble, and Cake Trace make practicing math playful and rewarding.
 üé® Creativity Activities ‚Äì Drawing, music, storytelling, imagination boosters. Kids can explore with tools like Drawboard or create in themed adventures such as Gingerbread Man.
 üòä Social-Emotional Learning ‚Äì Build confidence, kindness, and resilience.
 üß© Critical Thinking Skills ‚Äì Logic, puzzles, sequencing, and memory games. Popular choices like Fossil Finder and Soak n‚Äô Sort encourage kids to solve problems and think strategically.
What Makes HOMER Different
‚úî 1,000+ Activities ‚Äì Stories, reading games, math, creativity, SEL
 ‚úî Research-Based Pathway ‚Äì Designed by early learning experts
 ‚úî Personalized Profiles ‚Äì Up to 4 customizable child profiles with an annual membership
 ‚úî Ad-Free & Safe ‚Äì Parents can feel good about independent screen time
 ‚úî Parent Resources ‚Äì Bonus printables, tips, and activities for at-home learning
 ‚úî Proven Results ‚Äì 74% reading growth in just 15 minutes a day
Real Families. Real Results.
‚ÄúBy far the greatest! This app is a vital study tool, helping kids learn and play at the same time.‚Äù ‚Äì Bridget H.

 ‚ÄúThe HOMER app has helped my students‚Ä¶ it follows learning research, praising effort instead of just saying they‚Äôre smart.‚Äù ‚Äì Parthenia C.
Perfect for Every Stage
‚Ä¢ Toddlers ages 2‚Äì3 starting their ABCs and phonics basics
 ‚Ä¢ Preschoolers preparing for kindergarten with letters, sounds, and stories
 ‚Ä¢ Kindergarten and 1st grade kids learning to read with sight words and vocabulary
 ‚Ä¢ 2nd graders building fluency, comprehension, and reading confidence
Why Parents & Teachers Choose HOMER
‚úî Research-backed and award-winning early learning program
 ‚úî Personalized by age, level, and interests so every child stays engaged
 ‚úî Encourages curiosity and independence with 1,000+ activities kids actually love‚Äîwhether tracing words in Power Word Puppy, solving math in Addition Architect, or exploring classic stories like Humpty Dumpty
 ‚úî Builds confidence through play while teaching real reading skills
 ‚úî Trusted by families and educators as a safe, ad-free learning app
‚≠ê Try membership free for 30 days and start your child‚Äôs reading adventure today with HOMER‚Äîthe proven learn-to-read app designed to build mastery, confidence, and a lifelong love of reading.

summary: The Essential Early Reading App for Kids for kids 2-8

scraped_reviews.content: I downloaded this like 5 seconds ago and I already have a complaint. I can't even make it past the loading screen. And why isn't this advertised as something you have to pay for, with the price next to it, like every other company that doesn't wish to trick its consumers? Because, it's NOT FREE. Tons of negitive comments, but I just wanted to try for myself. Cool idea, horribly executed. Should be free. Not even worth the download and delete. NO STARS!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your feedback. To ensure our members are able to enjoy continuous HOMER service, all of our memberships automatically renew. We try to make this as clear as possible both during the purchase process and in our Terms of Use, we apologize for any confusion! For further assistance, please reach out to us at support@homerapp.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Love the app and how easy it is to use and navigate. The only problem I come across at least 1 time every time I use the app is that something always freezes and I have to close out completely and choose a different game or activity. The app will just stay stuck on loading and nothing ever loads. Maybe in the next update they can fix that issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Maya we're happy you're enjoying HOMER! We're sorry you're running into technical issues. Please tell your parents to reach out to our customer service support team at support@learnwithhomern to further assist with this issue!

scraped_reviews.content: There needs to be a confirmation prompt when hitting the back arrow in the upper left hand corner during a lesson. My son constantly bumps it unintentionally in the middle of a lesson and it goes back to the map losing his progress and making him start over. Not worth the money. At least if no prompt then save the spot in the lesson instead of forcing the user to restart the entire thing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jed, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback! If there is anything we could do to help, please don't hesitate to reach out to our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Best content of any kids learning game that I have downloaded by far. That being said, the game freezes up every two minutes. If you close out and re-open the game it works just fine for a couple minutes and then freezes up again. This would be fine, but progress within each lesson is lost making it frustrating for my son to have to repeat half of each lesson. I uninstalled after about an hour of dealing with this .
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're so sorry for any technical issues you have been experiencing. If you could, please reach out to our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com. We would love the chance to assist you!

scraped_reviews.content: I can't get it to go past the letter A. We are stuck on the short video about CAKE! my kids have watched it so many times but it won't give them the blue ribbon and let us move on. Id really like to get this fixed so they can keep using this app. We are in the trial period of a 1 month subscription...going to cancel if not promptly resolved:( Updating my review...after reinstalling the app it finally let us move on. My kids love this app. I love the learning parts but not all the songs etc.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kandi! If you could, please write to our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com. We will investigate this issue more closely for you and resolve it as quickly as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: Gets stuck on the paint level every time. I feel bad leaving two stars for a trial of this program, which has clearly had a lot of thought and effort into it, but like many reviews i see on here, it just gets stuck on the paint level and stops progressing. I found a work around by logging in the website and turning off the track restriction for one level and turning it back on after that, but there's a lot of steps to be had. Any time you need to do something, you have to put your birthday in.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jeff, thank you for your feedback! Our members' feedback is very important to us and we will share this with the HOMER team. In the meantime, if you have any questions or concerns please feel free to reach out to our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I signed up for the trial offer. My kid loves Homer so far, but there are technical issues. Most games have been functioning, but a handful or so wont load and eventually takes us back to the home screen. I'm at a crossroad. I want to keep the subscription for my kid, but am nervous these glitches will not be fixed and may potentially get worse. Leaning more towards ending subscription near the end of the free trial.

Probably a great app but the advertisement is misleading. You have to purchase the app to use it. It seems like a free app as it allows you to download and create an account for free, but then you hit the paywall before you get to any content. By pay wall, I mean "free trial" which will charge you after. I know myself and my child, taking away apps is difficult and I don't like to pay for apps because I'm a poor millennial üòÖ I'm sure it's probably a great app, but it isn't free.

APP IS NOT WORKING. Glitches occasionally, and things do appear right, on the screen. My son and I have games not loading for us. We click on things over & over & certain games still don't load. Then for art, you can't erase the stickers... you can't delete them, you have to close out of the art game completely, and then go all the way back in just so you have a clean slate to do art work & drawing again. Very frustrating for my 3 year old with low patience tolerance. üíî PLEASE FIX!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jacob, we would love the chance to assist you. If you could, please reach out to our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com. Please include the email address your HOMER membership is under, as well as the device you are using to access HOMER Reading. We look forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: The Homer app is very easy to navigate and all of my kids have loved using it. It has been a great resource as a learning aid and I haven't come across any weird content in it. When my kids aren't doing the parts that are focused on learning, the recreational activities (videos, drawing) keep them entertained as well. My oldest aged out of it at 8 at a time when the app had much less content. Currently my 6 and 3 year old enjoy it.

The program does an excellent job of teaching children to read. Unfortunately, it frequently has errors that their IT seems to be unable to fix for weeks at a time. Technical support is never any help, just asks the same question, "What OS are you using?" which is always up to date. The issues always magically resolve themselves after several weeks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kaley, we are so sorry you had issues with the program, but glad to hear that everything is working properly for you now. Please don't hesitate to reach back out to us at support@homerapp.com if you ever need any additional assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: After we made our account it just keeps saying loading and switching between landscape mode back and forth over and over until it finally freezes. Doesn't matter how many times I force quit and restart wont get out of that stage I even uninstalled and reinstalled. Such a joke. I don't understand how it's so highly recommended when it doesn't even work!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we are here to help! If you could, please reach out to our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com. Thank you, we hope to hear from you soon!

scraped_reviews.content: We used this app awhile ago and was great. Signed up again and it crashes ALL the time. My kids wont even try it anymore because they are so frustrated. I uninstalled every other single app on their kindle fires to ensure enough memory. And still crashes. My subscription renews at the end of the year and I will be canceling it if the issue isnt resolved.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We would love the chance to help! Please reach out to our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I cancelled my subscription almost immediately after signing up 2 months ago. I opened my paypal to see that I have been charged two months. I did sign up for the free trial but after playing around I‚Äôm the app the same hour, I cancelled it. I read other reviews stating this happened (continuing to be charged after cancelling) and just knew their was no way a company could get away with that. It‚Äôs fraud. THEN do not try locating a contact number. It does not exist!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We have no way of charging cancelled memberships, so we apologize for any confusion the cancellation process may have caused. We would be happy to try and locate the active account and help you cancel. If you could, please reach out to our team at support@homerapp.com. We look forward to assisting you!

scraped_reviews.content: I really wanted my 2 year old to try this . And when they said 30 days free trail I believed them. But like always they ask for a credit card number which tells me and shows me that these 30 days really are not free and so if after 30 days you decide it's not for you the odds will be they are going to charge you for something and then say it was in the fine print. Now , I did find another app called playgarden pen and it truly is 30 days free. It does not ask for any kind of card. Try it!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It is our priority that kids enjoy a safe, ad-free learning environment. So, rather than taking revenue from ads, we charge a low monthly fee. We apologize for any frustration this might have caused!

scraped_reviews.content: Never could get it to even work. App is perfectly fine up until the point you agree to the terms of the subscription to the fee, then suddenly it can't find your email, doesn't load or just can't locate your information even though you have a receipt from Google. The one positive is that you can easily unsubscribe from Google play apps and very easily delete the app. Never got to see the app actually work and couldn't even get it to the point my son could actually use it. Waste of my time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Steph, thank you for bringing this to our attention! We would love the chance to assist you. If you could, please reach out to our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com. Please include the email address your HOMER membership is under, as well as the device you are using to access HOMER Reading. We look forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: Don't purchase, too many glitches, not worth it. We have two other subscription services but my 2 year old loves homer, unfortunately the app goes black while it's still talking numerous times in a single session of playing and is frustrating for both of us. I would uninstall this if it were free, certainly not worth paying for with these glitches.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are so sorry to hear this, but we are here to help! Please reach out to our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com. We look forward to assisting you!

scraped_reviews.content: This was a great app at first. The content was perfect for my kids but then the app stopped letting me log in. I uninstalled and reinstalled, I contacted customer support, I tried to change my password, and again contacted customer support. It has been months and I have had zero contact from them and cannot cancel the subscription nor can I access the app. I am highly dissatisfied and quite upset at this point.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Danarai, we're so sorry for any delays in hearing from us. Our Member Experience team will be reaching out to you shortly. We sincerely apologize for the miscommunication and issues you have experienced when trying to use HOMER Reading. We will work hard to resolve this for you as quickly as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: App is great and fun for the kids when it works. Three stars bc most of the time it is very slow loading (turning on, switching activities, etc.) We are still using the app during the free trial but will be cancelling at the end due to how slow it is. Would give 5 stars if it was faster...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Alison, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We would be happy to assist you with this today. Please reach out to us at support@homerapp.com and include your device information, and someone will be with you shortly!

scraped_reviews.content: Infuriating! I installed this in the car on the side of the road while on a road trip with a 4 year old. I was desperate to find something to keep him occupied during the long ride. I could not ever get it set up to work (warning, it requires detailed set up time) nor could I delete the year long subscription until the end of paying monthly for an unworkable (for me) AP. I fumed every month when I saw that charge appear on my AmEx card. Infuriating to be stuck paying for a useless AP for a full year.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Gloria, we would be happy to assist you with this. Please reach out to our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com and include the email address associated with your account. Someone will be with you shortly.

scraped_reviews.content: Downloaded for my son (6) and daughter (3), and they are loving it! We really like how it progresses through learning and has multiple teaching activities to keep things from getting boring. Also love the art and narration - way more interactive and organic than other learning apps. I'm excited to see how quickly my 3yo can learn to read, she's been asking to play every night so far, and making good progress!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are thrilled to hear you and your family are enjoying HOMER! We're looking forward to hearing about the progress your little ones make in their learning journey.

scraped_reviews.content: app crashes a lot. I'm really mad because we paid for the whole year and all for it to keep crashing ! PLEASE FIX IT!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Your experience is very important to us, and we want to make this right. Could you let us know the type of device you‚Äôre using and the version of the app you have installed? This will help us pinpoint the issue faster.


Thank you again for bringing this to our attention.

scraped_reviews.content: I was charged twice and my son doesn‚Äôt even use the app and I haven‚Äôt been able to contact anyone about my refund.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I'm truly sorry for any inconvenience. Your experience is very important to us, and we genuinely want to help you further! Please don‚Äôt hesitate to let us know how we can make things right. We‚Äôre here to help in any way we can. Please send us an email at support@learnwithhomer‚Äã.com.

scraped_reviews.content: DO NOT BUY THIS APP. This company is a total scam. First of all the app content is not great. There are much better learning apps out there. Secondly, the cancellation process is ridiculous. I cancelled during my trial period and confirmed everything and assumed that was the end of it. Then three months later I notice I have been billed monthly despite cancelling. I go back into my account and I see that they have now added a clause saying that after canceling the subscription on their website you still have to go into the desktop (does not work on app) version of Paypal and go into your payments in settings to ALSO cancel there. Otherwise you will be billed despite cancelling. That's crazy. I don't understand how this is legal.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for any frustration the cancellation processes might have caused. We try to make it as clear as possible that you will need to cancel your recurring payments with PayPal, we are sorry to hear we missed the mark this time! For assistance with your HOMER membership please reach out to our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Haven't been able to use it at all throughout the free trial! gets stuck on some circulating stars over and over ..like it's loading. our after school screen time is limited so always just moved on to something else..because I didn't want to waste all that time waiting...then I miss the cut off by a few hours to cancel subscription - and now I've already paid for another month of nothingness. üò©üò†
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Lauren, thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience. If you would like assistance, we are here to help! Please reach out to our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com.

scraped_reviews.content: When you're paying that much monthly for an app subscription, you expect it to work properly. It never recognized me as a subscriber and if I tried to log in it would just go to a screen telling me to sign up. I don't want to even bother trying to fix the situation. App deleted and subscription cancelled. Waste of money unless it actually functions.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nickie, we are so sorry to hear this! If you would like assistance we would love the chance to help. Please reach out to our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I love the "My Pathway" aspect and I like the idea of short "steps/stones" it keeps my little one interested as she has a short attention span. However 98% of the time it glitches and doesn't load and crashes. VERY frustrating. Will be cancelling my subscription. If it wasn't for these issues It would be a 5 star no doubt. Maybe in the near future the bugs will he fixed and I will give it another shot. Until then no thank you.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We would love to look into this issue with you. Please reach out to us at support@homerapp.com and include the email address associated with your account and the device information. Thank you for your time!

scraped_reviews.content: I paid for subscription but my account was not renewed. I emailed a number of times with receipt to the customer support but the support tem are so dumb that they keep sending me link to renew membership with my credit card details which means I pay again. Can't they troubleshoot at once. They don't have any contact number where I can't speak too. I would come back. The app content are good but if you get stuck not good customer support and your money and days are lost. Worst tem !!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kavita, we are so sorry to hear that you have had a frustrating experience with your account. A member of our Member Experience team with be with you shortly. We look forward to resolving this with you as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: My daughter is excited to use it, its a perfect mix of challenging learning modules and creative art and games so she doesnt get bored with it. We have seen an already huge jump in our daughters ability to write and recognize both upper and lower case letters. She has started reading small words and writing with little assistance at 3 years old. Great!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are so happy to hear your little one is learning with HOMER Learn & Grow.

scraped_reviews.content: I almost never write reviews, but I have tried so many pre-k education apps and non of them are even come close to Homer. Most apps are just games that have some mild educational connection such as jumping over letter of the alphabet. Homer actually teaches. It makes my kids think and challenges them to learn one step at a time. My 2 year old and 5 year old both use it multiple times a week and they love it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are so happy to hear this! Thank you so much for taking the time to share the progress your little ones have made with HOMER Reading!

scraped_reviews.content: My 8yr old downloaded this app & tried to use it as he thought it was a free trial (December 19th 2019) & he never even used it as its on my phone & he couldn't understand how to use the app anyway. You have then gone on to take 7 further payments off me of ¬£7.49! I couldn't figure out where this missing money was coming from until i contacted my bank then i was able to cancel the subscription. I want a full refund on my money you took from my account. He's never used this & surely you can see??
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to see this. HOMER Reading is classified as a free app because it is free to download and has a limited free-use option. It is our priority that kids enjoy a safe, ad-free learning environment. So, rather than taking revenue from ads, we charge a low monthly fee. Please reach out to us at support@homerapp.com for assistance information.

scraped_reviews.content: I reactivated my Homer account after a year as I received a mail from you offering a discount for 3 months. I even made a payment for the same on the website. But when I login to the app, it is asking me to subscribe again for the regular price you offer.  Secondly, your backend service sucks as I've reached out to you and I haven't received any reply regarding this issue. Please provide a number I can call on to discuss further.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are here to help! Please reach out to our Member Experience team at support@learnwithhomer.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Bought the subscription for the promo they're having to give back to kids. I used this as a trial a while ago and it worked great. Once legged in, it won't even take me to the home screen. It just has a constant loading screen. I've emailed them and haven't heard back yet (about 5 days ago). I've Uninstaller and reinstalled on multiple devices and still the same...just a loading page that never changes. Hopefully this gets fixed soon.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Alexis! We just received your email and I am in the process of replying to you! Thank you for letting us know, and we are looking forward to helping you!

scraped_reviews.content: Fun until it stops working. My toddler really enjoyed this app, but the pathway would randomly stop after a certain point and he was unable to continue progressing even though he had just finished with all the letters. He was really sad and it was a huge let down between it freezeing all the time and it not allowing him to continue to make progress. I emailed technical support for help and never received a response so I cancelled our subscription.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If you could, please reach out to our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com, so that we may assist you further. We would love the chance to help!

scraped_reviews.content: You have to setup payment before you can proceed to trial, i wish it had said that before I filled out a user profile. Yes you can cancel your subscription at anytime but I'd rather make my own decision at the end of the trial whether I decide to proceed with entering my payment details. Too often, apps make money because people forget to cancel at the end of trial. If the app is so good, the owners should be confident that people will enter payment details after the trial! UNINSTALLING.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for any frustration the signup process may have caused. A debit/credit card is required to activate your 30-day free trial to reserve your paid membership. It also allows us to monitor who has had a trial or not, as there is only one trial per member allowed. We hope this information is helpful!

scraped_reviews.content: The program is good, when it works. It constantly is crashing, and not saving the place within a lesson is ridiculous. My daughter has done the same level 2, step 4 lesson 4 times because it freezes, restarts, etc. The content is very good, but if she can't get past the lesson, what good is it? I just paid yesterday, and I think I will be cancelling before my next payment.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jennifer, we would love the chance to investigate this with you. Please reach out to us at support@homerapp.com and include the email address associated with your account as well as the device that you are using. We look forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: Fairly disappointed with the quality of the app and site itself. Loaded app on our Samsung tablet, trying to select child's dob but because the app forces landscape mode, I cannot scroll down to see that section as the app doesn't scale properly! Then decided to sign up online, entered my PayPal details. Confirmed subscription, etc then when being redirected after payment, I get an error that the page has an error! So now I'm signed up for payment, and have no homer account. What!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are here to help, Adam! Please email our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com and include the email address associated with your account. We look forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: So far the content is pretty good except for a slingshot of letters to the tower. Its completely bugged. If you launch letters to fast, it will stop talking and stop you from completing the exercise. Even taking time to complete slowly will sometimes still make you redo this. The exercise should be replaced with something else to avoid this frustration in the future. Please test and see for yourself.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are so sorry to hear this, but we are here to help. If you could, please write to our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Content is good when it works. It has bugs. It doesn't want to load very often and sometimes you have to do the same activity 5 times before it'll let you go to the next activity on the learning path it doesn't save progress well. The good content means nothing if your child never wants to play it because it's always bugging out and loading.

I am on the free thirty day trial and I am having so much trouble with canceling my subscription. I have contacted customer service twice and no help. They keep telling me I downloaded it through apple when I don't even own apple devices. I hope to get this resolved soon. Other than that the app itself is good just not for us personally.

For a while, during my 30 day trial I was having some troubles with the app freezing so I was going to cancel but my girls were both super disappointed. Since I began the subscription I haven't had any problems. Just today both of my daughter's were using them app at the same time with 0 issues on my husband's and my phone. They were both struggling with letter sounds and now they are reading the stories in the various levels of the pathway with very little assistance! Great app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jenelle, thank you so much for your kind words, and for taking the time to share your experience. We are thrilled to hear you and your daughters are enjoying HOMER Reading!

scraped_reviews.content: Not what I expected. I just downloaded the app yesterday and it keeps crashing. It takes a long time to load and I have to get out of app and get back in for it to work. Also, it does not work offline, which I though it did because I saw somewhere online that supposedly it did. The price differs too, since I saw it was $45 a year rather than $60. I would be canceling before my trial expires.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We would love the chance to help! Please send us an email at support@learnwithhomer, with the email used for your membership, so that we may assist you further.

scraped_reviews.content: My 7-year-old loves the interactive games‚ÄîHomer is the most engaging learning app we've tried. However, the stories between games often freeze, forcing us to close and restart the app. This frustrates my son, especially since he looks forward to the stories. It‚Äôs making him not want to play or learn on the app anymore. Please fix the freezing issue‚Äîthis could be an amazing tool if it worked smoothly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I'm truly sorry for any inconvenience. Your son's experience is very important to us, and we genuinely appreciate your feedback. Please don‚Äôt hesitate to let us know how we can make things right. We‚Äôre here to help in any way we can. Please send us an email at support@learnwithhomer‚Äã.com.

scraped_reviews.content: My son is not interested in learning letters/reading. This has engaged him with fun simple learning games that are mixed with creative games in just the right amount. He loves them. Also, the way it's set up forces him to do the things he's not as interested in to do the games/activities in the next level he is interested in. He went from refusing to attempt drawing letters to being excited he accomplished one on his own in about a (of playing every other day) week. Best app
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Evangelina, we cannot thank you enough for leaving us this wonderful review! Thank you so much for sharing your experience with HOMER Reading.

scraped_reviews.content: I am cancelling before we can begin. I have been registered for 8 days now. The app has never worked on my Samsung S9 no matter how many times I uninstall & reinstall. I tried to load it on my desktop but it is not allowed even though the app store says my device is compatible. You can not use it via the internet (no cloud based option). So before we can even try it, we must delete it. It's a shocker that it is recommended by so many reputable sources, may be fraudulent. Makes me think twice about the whole reputability of the program.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, and we are sorry for any negative experience you had while using HOMER Reading. If there is anything we could do to make your experience better please reach out to support@homerapp.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Its great when its not glitching, which is often. It takes a long time to start and will randomly stop working. I also can't update any info as it says we don't have an account but my bank can say other wise.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I‚Äôm sorry for the trouble you encountered with the app. Please email us, and we‚Äôll be happy to assist you further.

scraped_reviews.content: I canceled my membership with these people about a year or two ago. Suddenly, this year, they made attempts to charge me for a subscription I'm no longer paying for‚ÅâÔ∏è Luckily cards are locked, so they couldn't get anything. THATS NOT EVEN THE WORST PART‚ö†Ô∏è! I CANT DELETE MY CARD INFORMATION WITH THEM. OR THE ACCOUNT. When I made attempts to delete my card, they basically demanded a working card. I had to put in an old faulty card so I could get my original away from themüò°. DO NOT TRUST THIS‚ö†Ô∏è
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for sharing your experience, and I‚Äôm truly sorry to hear about the difficulties you‚Äôve encountered. We understand how frustrating this situation must be, and we take your concerns seriously.

Please reach out to our support team, and we‚Äôll work to resolve this as quickly as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: I saw on the screen of 30 day free trial so I downloaded the app and subscribed for the trial. After downloading the app wouldnt work..kept closing so I uninstalled it. Then I unsubscribed and noticed I got billed $9.99 right away on my phone bill. I want my money back because I was under the impression this was a free trial. I didnt use the app and uninstalled right away
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Morsal, we would love the chance to investigate this with you. Please reach out to our Member Experience team at support@homerapp.com and include the email address associated with your account. Thank you for your time!

scraped_reviews.content: I am a 3rd grade teacher. I stumbled across this app and use it with my 4 year old daughter. She love the stories, the interaction, and the feeling of success she gets from working through the levels. One thing I love about the app is how it gives directions for CORRECT letter formation. I find that correct letter formation is often "looked over" in her current preschool environment. Thank you!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave your review. We're so happy to see your family is enjoying HOMER Reading.

scraped_reviews.content: Edited: Dealing withMembership cancellation on the website is confusing not easy at all. Not listed on main menu. Not located on the upper right. Account and Billing keeps freezing on Settings!!! Beware of signing up on their website. Cancellation is thru email only not much tech support, but they were able to help me cancel trial luckily. Would have love to stay with them but don't offer number for tech support. My daughter 5 likes the app but not my son 3 which he does not find entertaining.

title: Grok ‚Ä¢ Smartest AI Advisor
description: Grok is an AI-powered assistant, developed by xAI, designed to be maximally truthful, useful, and curious. Get answers to any question, generate striking images and videos, engage in natural conversations with voice mode, and upload pictures to gain a deeper understanding of your world. With Grok, the universe is in your hands!
descriptionHTML: Grok is an AI-powered assistant, developed by xAI, designed to be maximally truthful, useful, and curious. Get answers to any question, generate striking images and videos, engage in natural conversations with voice mode, and upload pictures to gain a deeper understanding of your world. With Grok, the universe is in your hands!
summary: Answer any question & generate striking images with AI. Real-time data from X.

scraped_reviews.content: the app can be a little funky to use. but the software is great, quick, informative. I've noticed when I type a question and hit the arrow to drop my keyboard, the messages disappear and I have to go back and find them in the conversations. Or it's overly sensitive to swipe to discover, but resistant to swipe back to ask. I'm using a Samsung fold 7 latest updates

I like interacting with this AI. It picked up pretty quickly how I like to be interacted with. For example, in an exciting situation, Grok will address me as Dude! or hell say Hell yeah! Unfortunately, I have noticed recently many many discrepancies and factual errors. Even when I correct him and he apologizes and promises not to make the same mistake again, he makes a similar mistake or a different mistake and it just goes round and round like that until I get fed up and just exit the app.

I use it to role-play. free content is limited to something like three messages before being restricted. I tried the image generator a few times and the image wasn't even remotely close to what I described. however the actual written responses are pretty good; detailed, accurate (for the most part), good memory (for those limited messages at least).

What's hoping for a little more functionality plus when I ask it a question that requires me navigating through my phone, which she has great answers. She goes to too fast and I can't keep up with her.She doesn't accept my request to pause until she's already too far into the explanation one improvement I would like is the picture generator I don't know exactly no how that works. Some kind of tutorial on it would be great. I would like to be able to make a picture and have it save to galleries.

It's a good a research tool as any if the other AI apps, but they're free. Not $30 a month. Many functions only work on desktop...not on Android. As an image generator, this is a waste of time. Distorts images. Makes changes not asked for, often producing exact opposite of request. Unable to perform even simple tasks without multiple, multiple, multiple, prompts.

fairly good, so far. The only issue I have with it is that the "free" content has a bit of a limit, especially when it comes to animating. you get an unknown limit to how many images you can animate, and then that's it. now I don't know if the limit has refreshes or has some kind of cool down timer before you can use it again. if not, it would be nice if it did, and if it had some way for the user to see it. update: There are cases where the app fails to generate a video for uploaded images.

The app is great, helps me with a lot, but after like 5 hours after waiting for the limit to reset, falling asleep, and not checking it for like 2 hours after waking up, it still says "message limit reached". I'm a free user by the way, so if thus could be fixed, that'd be great.

disappointing. when converting pictures to short videos, it often turns into an idiot. it frequently depicts the subjects bouncing up and down spastically and at a high rate of speed. it frequently disregards prompts, leaving you to wonder how it drew it's conclusion based on the prompt you gave. there is also a limit as to how many you can make in a 24-hour. even if you're using one of the pay versions. there's great potential here, but they're nowhere near it right now

After one or two messages it will turn into a mode that you cannot send any more messages. Instead of send button, will be some sort of square button that don't do anything. Before that, it worked only as trial or so, limited version, even though it's been connected to my account. So cannot ask more then three questions, then problem appeared that explains at first. On the top of it, it's slower then PC version. I gave 3 stars b/c PC version is actually good.

On Pixel, Ask works, but Imagine just says "no network connection". Also, I can only enter one input before I have to force stop the app and clear its cache in order to be able to enter another input. The search button stops working. It seems like a useful AI, but I can't tell, because I can only ever ask one question with no follow up.

The imagine function is completely broken. It was normal on the first day, but a few days later, it looks a lot more limitations were added? For things which I used to be able to generate before, now it says "Video moderated". And I'm not even asking for anything that bad. The description is also misleading, because it says it has "full NSFW support", but that is clearly not the case, at least anymore. It would be nice if you could loosen the moderation, and tell us exactly what's not allowed.

Good: Calculating very tedious math, identifying things in images. Terrible: Image generation, shopping (100% dead links or discontinued products and incorrect specs). OK: repair and mechanical. When I ask about things I'm super familiar with it, it makes many, massive mistakes, which makes me weary about the accuracy of information I'm getting on subjects I'm not a familiar with. At this point, in many ways it's wasting my time to the point that the subscription fee seems very high.

The app is amazing when it worked for me. I've never had issues with other similar apps but Grok randomly logged me out one day and it now just gets stuck on "Redirecting, you are being redirected please wait..." when trying to log in and never finishes. I can try to skip login to use the app but it just displays "No Network Connection." Followed all troubleshooting I found online and it's still happening. It's kind of a frustrating situation.

A very good AI and app, not to mention having it on a phone is convenient. The phone is only missing 'Deeper'Search (and probably for a valid reason compared to web based grok). As an example for support, the app was fixed while I was sleeping. That is awesome support so thank you!. Pixel 9 phone here. Used to do this as a dev fix stuff while others were sleeping. now I can truly appreciate it.

I did a search for a new place to move to and was amazed at the thoroughness of the results. I provided several details about my desired characteristics in my question, and found the various options that came back in the answer well reasoned, uncannily responsive and useful in my search. I'm very impressed with the Grok tool and the technology behind it.

the more I interacted with it, the more depressed I ended up getting. it couldn't keep track of a very simple, very IMPORTANT conversation. I kept tabs on all the irrelevant things I talked about. but ANYTHING with substance, was nowhere to be found. and the image generator is an absolute JOKE! you basically have to hold its hand, fine tuning EVERYTHING until you start to get close to what you are looking for, which generally takes at LEAST an hour.

It's infuriating that when you try to upload photos only camera, screenshots, and download folders are available. I checked my permissions, there aren't even permissions to allow all videos and photos on your phone. this is such a frustrating stupid design in several apps and I'm not going to give it more than one star until they fix this basic feature that should be available. If you go to upload file and then go to the folders with the picture you want to upload you're not allowed to upload.

With just a few days of using it Grok has won me and became one of my fav ones that I use it helps me understand things easier, sumerizes long info that take ages to finish consuming into a more easy to digest one, and helps with bunch of other things and the upcoming image editor which is a unique one ( I haven't used yet since I don't use the web version but hope it comes to the app ) would be a game changer either u can add, remove or modify things in the images. Ty for reading
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for downloading our app! We will keep working on it!

scraped_reviews.content: Needs work, a lot of work in a sense. Especially with how sensitive and twitchy it is. I've had to write out entire sections 3 times now because my screen either flipped or something else triggered, and my written out chat was erased. The screen flip also messed up an entire chat, completely misplacing where all the previous chats and responses were, ruining everything.

I am genuinely impressed with the astuteness of Grok, whether talking about politics (because it's better than talking with real people about such a hot topic), having it continue writing an unfinished story, or having it help you in the kitchen by adapting recipes to what you have on hand. It isn't always perfect...but then who is. I look forward to watching it develop.

Was great, latest update fails to generate videos very frequently, only 3 in 10 works on average, and are very slow when they do work. Takes roughly twice as long as it used to, just last week. Image downloads now fail every time. Previous version had no such issues. Tried reinstalling, it's the app. Having paid for a year of premium/super it's unacceptable really.

I only tried to use it for the first time, and I already suffered from bugs due to some server/connection issues; the request couldn't be retried, the UI didn't help describe or recover the situation-it was all just stuck, leaving all guesswork to me. There are only so many things you can neglect in a simple chat UI, and you failed all of them. I also saw some ad for a novel feature, but when opened, it stayed stuck on black screen. Can you not employ one part-time student for error handling UX?

Great app, but it gets really annoying. Sometimes I ask it to summarize text from about 4-6 pages from books (and other stuff for work), and it always gives me something that I didn't want. I ask it to create a summary of the text in the pictures, and it always gives me "The narrator says... etc", I don't fully well dont understand why it doesn't understand the difference between summarizing the information without saying "narrator this narrator that" I just want to start at the beginning.

Been really enjoying the free use of creating 5 second videos from still images. However, the download function doesn't work, so I've previously had to screen record then crop that. Wasn't a massive deal but now the videos two icons to the right and left of the video. By the time I've cropped that out, I'm left with next to nothing. I totally appreciate that you have a daily limit on the free version, but what is the point now if I can't download and do anything with the videos. 1* till fixed.

Going to Imaging by left swipe is absolutely unsuccessful and annoying function for readers. Especially when you try to read tables and code examples. Image must be ‚Äúhidden" function. I mean not always right under your finger. I use this app not for fun, but for getting information. And this function is really annoying me. Uploading file/picture for analysis depends of your luck. 60-70% attempts are not lucky.

Grok was really good but something happened to it more recently. It keeps providing such non-sense responses and I find myself arguing with it more than having productive conversations. The biggest issue though is the voice mode. It constantly disconnects and you're forced to re-initiate the session. Would really like to see the voice mode fixed. Oh and voice mode on desktop has never worked for me and I have no idea why. Overall it has potential but way too many bugs and issues at the moment.

When I start a conversation in a new room, the bot can't remember the conversation from the old one. Even though I turned on the "Personalize with memories" mode, the bot can't even remember something as simple as my name, let alone other IMPORTANT things‚Äîit's bad because it can't remember anything. I hope this is fixed soon.

Tried it out for a bit but it felt under developed. I saw several posts praising it for its premium functions so I subscribed to see if they'd be an improvement but sadly, after less than an hour of use, I'm already canceling my subscription and uninstalling. Overall displeased with the performance. The responses feel more sporadic than many other apps and on android, the additional features are limited and just aren't worth it. An unfortunate waste of $30 but, live and learn.

So to start off grok overall is good. I mainly use the video generation feature and it's brilliant! there is a limit on how much generations you can make in a day but that's to be expected. plus you get a lot of generations. There are certain things that will get moderate which is slightly annoying but oh well. one thing it's missing is maybe the option to choose how long the video is, because it's locked to six seconds. I'd say I prefer the more normal image generators than the grok one.

I have the premium grok and I wished I didn't. It regularly loses track of information, it takes a super long time to get a response, if your phone goes to sleep while you're waiting it just cancels the request and you never get a reply. The quality of information it provides is good, and in some ways it very Inteligent, but in more ways than not, it's stupid, forgets important issues, and stops processing a reply if you back app it, or sleep it.

When it comes to putting stuff that involves math together, it does what I want. It's also good at formal letters... bit when it comes to natural language, it's pretty bad. Chatgpt generates according the essence of what you tell it. Grok severely lacks this ability. No matter how much information and direction I give it, the writing always sounds empty or highly diluted.

the 5 stars is so it reaches the top. this was great for all the options available which is why I bought the full version. But ever since all these recent updates, you can't do very much with out getting moderated! everything is constantly moderated! I was going to re-subscribe but unless something changes very soon I'm not paying another dime.

grok is one of the least accurate ai's i've used. it also can't remember anything you ask it to, but it will randomly bring up some conversation from earlier in the chat(for no apparent reason). the imagine i2v is where the app is actually worth something, but it won't let you upscale, so you use the website anyway. ultimately, this app is useless. it also keeps cancelling my video gens or refusing to upload a photo. its a stuffed animal, and its not telling me moderated, it just stops loading.

lipsync has improved considerably, but it still fails quite often and I have to use Dreamface to fix it. For some reason, male voices most of the time sound metallic, female voices, are fine, it adds unprompted words to the dialog and only one person or the wrong one talks in the dialogs instead of both. I think the latest update works worse than the earlier ones.

I thought it was a fantastic app up until it became completely unresponsive a couple of days ago and never recovered. Now, all I ever get back from the AI is "Input Error" regardless of what the input is. edit: I just had to reinstall, and it's working again just as beautifully as before

it's fantastic! it's my go-to for when I have a question. instead of being bombarded by all kinds of questions and not getting to the point it gets straight to the point, answers my question and gives me all the information and background. it's unbelievably good. I really do truly feel like I'm in the future. Thanks, Groc Elon and the team

Can't answer questions properly, if you ask one question then the next one will get answer from the first one no matter what. Can't even show the correct answer to simple math, just a bunch of wrong answers kind of like a five year old, just that the five year old would eventually end up correct. It also gives a whole lot of wrong answers to factual questions.

Even after getting premium the videos are limited to 6 seconds which is stupid. many image to video generator getting moderated though there is nothing dodgy going on. Many AI apps have waaaym more stuff in there default offer than this. also spicy mode and video ratio control do not exist in app only in website. even after paying which is false advertising. many videos get stuck in 100% with no output after 100% is reached. It also wastes multiple of limited daily uses. dont get premium.

What's not to love? This is my second favorite app after the pro version of ChatGPT. It will surpass it soon as they get the voice option to also write what it's saying so you can look at it and save the info from the conversation you had with it. Yes I have the premium paid version. Yes it's worth it, especially if you're in bus, it's an invaluable resource and tool. Sonnet /Claude / Anthropic looks to be teaming up for voice interaction now so we'll probably see Grok surpass GPT very soon.

This app is awesome when you use for writing stories and scenarios. Very easy to use, as long as you detail in what you want specifically, better than ChatGpt at it can covers almost everything. I use this for writing and reading mostly, so in the researching and create images areas I do not know. but other than that, I like this one most. I love to use this for writing stories and read them.

it's great for quick searches and clarifications. Really helpful even with my job as well. Wish that the SuperGrok is a bit cheaper so I can try it, it's just a bit too pricey to incorporate into my monthly expenses. Think of it like this, if they make it cheaper, more people will buy it and have more profit.

I'm still exploring Grok but find useful, everyday applications which make my life easier. Today, I came to ask if I could provide photos of bookshelves in my house and have Grok produce a list of every title on every shelf. I collect books, some signed, and this would allow me to keep track of my collection. I'm excited to see how this works. Grok takes the drudgery out of projects like this.

You can't create much. Things that don't need moderation, are heavily moderated. Why would I pay $30/month for an app that doesn't come through on what it offers. Especially, If I'm an adult over 18? And I asked to make a human figure "muscular, physically fit, and athletic" and it said "Video is Moderated." Yeah, no - unsubscribed. Going to uninstall soon. Idk why anyone would pay $30/month or $300 for that matter for an app that can't perform. You can't even delete videos of AI art you gen.

I've never experienced anything but "no network connection" from this app. All permissions are given, everything's updated, Javascript enabled, no ad blockers, and it says no connection. My internet is at 4/5 bars, it's a strong connection. I've never actually seen this app work. At all. Ever. Also, I'm not completely internet stupid so generally I'm aware when I'm being dumb about technology.....not this time. There's no "I" in this AI.

admittedly I was apprehensive about this app. I always leaned towards its biggest competitor. I used it alot more then I should for all kinds of things. well after the frustration of disagreeing with the mainstream I decided to give Grok a try. our conversation is about 3 hours long and I cant express how relieved I am on its "personality". highly recommend this app. by the way, this is my only real review I ever remember writing. thats how much I like it.

this Ai is pretty good I like the feature that when it's thinking it'll show you it's basic line of reasoning. this ai seems to be the least restricted AI i have ran into and so far hasn't given me false information. the only subtraction is if you aren't very direct it will give you 1 of 2 most likely things you meant instead of asking for clarification.

Much better than ChatGPT/Gemini for info gathering. if you want voice command or for it to talk to you, it's not that great (Gemini is better for general stuff) but this uses actual official websites to gather data and will give you the links to verify it. it's not ALWAYS 100% but if you question it, it will correct itself and give you correct data. Absolutely recommend. even for fun! Also it's a lot more animated so more realistic chat. Great fun to use!

There are now always issues with creating videos. I can't type in even the most harmless and wholesome prompts without the Ai saying "Video Moderated". I pay for the 29.99 a month. It was great the first 2 weeks but now it has become a pain to even create the simplest of video ideas. It's almost as if the the Ai got dumber and started to restrict everything I use as prompts.

it's a great set of tools. however, when in continuous conversations, the app does not stop my phone from going into standby and when that happens the conversation ends. I use a pixel 8 Pro with the latest Android 16. super annoying and the continuous conversation mode cannot be used because of this. otherwise everything else works fine.

since the new "customize grok" appears, despite double the prompt from customized response and conversation prompt, grok can't hold the prompt as requested. thus the inconsistency on results left me baffled, i love the old version (before customize grok) era more than this version. the old version still can holds prompt better even it made in conversation. update: frequent message "error please try again" not a glitch message appears.

title: PNC Mobile
description:
Check balances & recent transactions ‚Äì See current account activity for your checking, savings, credit card and loan accounts.

Protect your accounts ‚Äì Set up fingerprint or Face Authentication to securely sign on to the app. Or, reset your password quickly and conveniently if you need to.

Send money with Zelle¬Æ ‚Äì Send money simply, to people you know and trust (i) using your
mobile number or email address.

Transfer funds ‚Äì Transfer funds between eligible PNC accounts and external bank accounts (ii).

Make deposits ‚Äì Deposit checks quickly and easily with your Android device (iii).

Pay bills ‚Äì Add your bills and make one-time or recurring bill payments right from the app.

Manage your cards ‚Äì View and manage your PNC credit, debit and SmartAccess¬Æ cards and make in-store payments with PNC Pay right from the app.

Lock your cards ‚Äì Easily lock or unlock your PNC debit card or credit card if you misplace it.

Locate PNC ‚Äì Locate the nearest PNC ATM or branch using our location services, or search by zip code and street address.

If you have Virtual Wallet¬Æ, you‚Äôll have access to more tools and insights to help you work toward your financial goals.

See what‚Äôs free to spend ‚Äì Your Scheduled Out subtracts known bills and expenses from your available checking account balance to show you what‚Äôs free to spend, which we call your Free Balance. You‚Äôll also see potential Danger Days‚Ñ†, which is when your account is at risk of being overdrawn.

Visualize your money ‚Äì Use Money Bar¬Æ to see how much is available to spend with your Free Balance, what you‚Äôve scheduled for bills and how much you‚Äôve set aside for goals.

Know your activity ‚Äì Use the Calendar to see upcoming paydays and payments, and view a history of your transactions. You can pay bills, schedule bill reminders, track external payments, view potential Danger Days and more.

Track your spending & set budgets ‚Äì See where you're spending your money with categories like restaurants, gas and more. Then, create budgets to know if you‚Äôre staying on track.

Make saving easier ‚Äì Create savings goals to work toward your goals and keep track of your progress along the way. Set up automatic rules to regularly transfer money to your savings, like once a week or when you receive a paycheck.  Make saving fun using your personalized piggy bank to transfer money to your savings.

With PNC‚Äôs Security and Privacy, you can be confident that your personal and financial information will be protected while using our app.

(i) Zelle should only be used to send or receive money with people you know and trust. Before using Zelle to send money, you should confirm the recipient's email address or U.S. mobile phone number. Neither PNC nor Zelle offer a protection program for authorized payments made with Zelle. Zelle is available to almost
anyone with a bank account in the U.S. Transactions typically occur in minutes between enrolled users.
If the recipient has not enrolled, the payment will expire after 14 calendar days.
(ii) There are limits to the number of transactions you can make from a savings or money market account per month.
(iii) PNC does not charge a fee for Mobile Banking. However, third party message and data rates may apply. Mobile Deposit is a feature of PNC Mobile Banking.  Use of the Mobile Deposit feature requires a supported camera-equipped device and you must download a PNC mobile banking app.  Eligible PNC Bank account and PNC Bank Online Banking required. Certain other restrictions apply.  See the mobile banking terms and conditions in the PNC Online Banking Service Agreement.

Virtual Wallet, PNC SmartAccess and SmartAccess are registered trademarks of The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. ¬©2025 The PNC
Zelle and the Zelle related marks are wholly owned by Early Warning Services, LLC and are used herein under license.
